Content: A beautiful beach always a lovely cool breeze .  This was part of our holiday at Grand Hyatt.   Loved every minute.Not over crowded..lots of banana lounges and no charge.
review: beautiful always lovely cool breeze part holiday grand hyatt love every minutenot crowdedlots banana lounge charge

Content: Only here for the day. Hired a couple of sun loungers and had a nice relaxing afternoon on the beach. The waves were  very dumpy on the day which made swimming difficult. We saw a few people get bowled by the waves and one lady carried out by the lifeguards. The walk along the boardwalk was nice and the beach in front of the huge resorts was very quiet.
review: day hire couple sun lounger nice relax afternoon wave dumpy day make swim difficult saw people bowl wave one lady carry lifeguard walk along boardwalk nice front huge resort quiet

Content: We loved the beach but beware of big waves and currents. The bech walk is long and really nice to walk on.
review: love beware big wave current bech walk long really nice walk

Content: We went at the end of April to this beach whilst staying at The Laguna.  The beach is really nice lovely sand nice setting and not too busy.  It is tidal so the tide goes out but then this allows you to explore and see some fantastic things amongst the rocks and cave.  If during low tide you want to swim pop back to the pool.Early in the morning there is some seaweed but this is very quickly cleaned up, but we have really got to remember this is a real Beach!Overall a great beach
review: go end april whilst stay laguna really nice lovely sand nice set busy tidal tide go allow explore see fantastic thing amongst rock cave low tide want swim pop back poolearly morning seaweed quickly clean really get remember real beachoverall great

Content: Nice and relaxing - beautiful white and sandy and peaceful! Mainly western resorts around.The waves break far out on the reef- nice for a change!
review: nice relax beautiful white sandy peaceful mainly western resort aroundthe wave break far reef nice change

Content: We live in WA so usually when we get a beach holiday elsewhere we can be disappointed. Not this time. The scene is reminiscent of an advert for Bounty chocolate. Lots to do as well. Paradise
review: live wa usually holiday elsewhere disappointed time scene reminiscent advert bounty chocolate lot well paradise

Content: Lots of big hotels and plenty of lovely places to eat and drink here.The tide was low when we were there so more for paddling than swimming.They can organise water sports for you there but this was a more serene place for sunbathing. Saw it set up for a wedding too and looked beautiful.Nice to spend relaxing time there.
review: lot big hotel plenty lovely place eat drink herethe tide low paddle swimmingthey organise water sport serene place sunbathe saw set wedding look beautifulnice spend relaxing time

Content: Spent an arvo on a lounge with drink in hand watching the kites. No one hassled us at all and was just how a beach on holidays should be.
review: spent arvo lounge drink hand watch kite one hassle u holiday

Content: İt was quite nice beach. The beach was good but the sea not like thay. The sea is very short you cant swim you should walk
review: quite nice good sea thay sea short cant swim walk

Content: Best to swim Eastern side of beach near Hyatt. 2 beaches to chose from - separated by a headland with spectacular blow hole. Well worth a visit.
review: best swim eastern side near hyatt 2 beach chose separate headland spectacular blow hole well worth visit

Content: Great eateries and shopping that offers a wide range of dining options Conveniently located adjacent to many of Nusa Dua major resorts Offers convenient shopping with many other services such as spas and massages, Haircare and supermarkets
review: great eatery shop offer wide range dining option conveniently locate adjacent many nusa dua major resort offer convenient shop many service spas massage haircare supermarket

Content: We loved Nusa Dua beach it was so clean and beautiful not many people selling things which was nice and overall loved it kids could swim with the net being there felt safer
review: love nusa dua clean beautiful many people sell thing nice overall loved kid swim net felt safer

Content: We stayed in Grand Hyatt in Nusa Dua for few days. The beach in front the hotel is been cleaned each morning and is very clean. We loved that the lush trees were on the beach instead of umbrellas to give you shade. It just felt so natural and beautiful. You don’t see many people swimming as the tide is low , it comes up to knee level and when the tide is high maybe to waist level. It is the only beach we found in Bali that would be considered children safe. Waterblow was near by, 5 minutes walk and I would recommend an early morning walk to see the sunrise.Most beaches in Bali have bigger waves and are not suitable for swimming. You will see many people just playing in the shallow water or jumping the waves. Most beaches are suitable for surfing. A bit disappointing.
review: stay grand hyatt nusa dua day front hotel clean morning clean love lush tree instead umbrellas give shade felt natural beautiful dont see many people swim tide low come knee level tide high maybe waist level find bali consider child safe waterblow near 5 minute walk recommend early morning walk see sunrisemost beach bali big wave suitable swimming will see many people play shallow water jump wave beach suitable surf bit disappointing

Content: Not the best beach but not terrible.Only good when high tide, not a nice beach at low tide.Walked from end to the other to check out other areas.Outside larger resorts was kept reasonably clean otherwise could be littered with rubbish in other spots.Reasonably busy but nothing unexpected given how many resorts back on to it.Some basic water sports options if you are staying at one of the resorts (paddle boards, kayaks etc)First time to Bali, prefer Thailand beaches to these water is also warmer than what we experienced in Bali
review: best terribleonly good high tide nice low tidewalked end check areasoutside large resort keep reasonably clean litter rubbish spotsreasonably busy nothing unexpected give many resort back itsome basic water sport option stay one resort paddle board kayak etcfirst time bali prefer thailand beach water warmer experience bali

Content: Nice beach in Bali,very clean the beach,so clear the sea water you can see the sand until deep water,nice place for take photo
review: nice balivery clean beachso clear sea water see sand deep waternice place take photo

Content: Mornings were better due to high tide and less rocks in the sand. Lots of seaweeds on the beach though, so the beach didn’t look too clean. Still a fun place for water activities. Not as crowded as other popular beaches.
review: morning well due high tide less rock sand lot seaweed though didnt look clean still fun place water activity crowd popular beach

Content: The beach was clean and had a lot of chairs/lounges to relax in.  It's a destination wedding venue and we saw brides and grooms everyday!  They had set up a flower arbor and it was kind of fun to watch the photography from a distance.  We also watched some locals fishing way out in the water wearing traditional fishing clothing and conical hats. Never saw them catching anything but it added to the scenery!  There is a nice walkway out to the water where you can watch the sunrise.  It is worth getting up one morning (at least) and walking out to photograph!  If you don't make it out of bed in time, I'm posting a photo for you to photoshop yourself into.  It's very lovely!
review: clean lot chairslounges relax destination wedding venue saw bride groom everyday set flower arbor kind fun watch photography distance watch local fish way water wear traditional fishing clothing conical hat never saw catch anything added scenery nice walkway water watch sunrise worth get one morning least walk photograph dont make bed time im post photo photoshop lovely

Content: This is a nice pale, sandy beach in Bali.  We visited whilst out for a meal.  Lots of boats out in the water and not too many flies or mosquitoes as it was dark. Would recommend.
review: nice pale sandy bali visit whilst meal lot boat water many fly mosquito dark recommend

Content: Surprisingly nice with the resorts planting a row of beautiful palms and large leaf plants at the top. Tides are huge and can leave the reed exposed during low tide, in some cases the ugly wave break is exposed in front of Sofitel. A public walkway located at the top of the beach and is well built, serving walkers, bikers and as a valid connection in between hotels.There are little bars and freelance masseuses at the ends of the beach in between the big hotels, not as cheap as Kuta but ok.In July dry season the breeze blows consistent off the see and is refreshing and welcome.
review: surprisingly nice resort plant row beautiful palm large leaf plant top tide huge leave reed expose low tide case ugly wave break expose front sofitel public walkway locate top well built serve walker bikers valid connection hotelsthere little bar freelance masseuse end big hotel cheap kuta okin july dry season breeze blow consistent see refresh welcome

Content: watch out for critters lurking in sand at low tide or wear sandals! great space though sometimes a bit windy
review: watch critter lurk sand low tide wear sandal great space though sometimes bite windy

Content: Before our recent visit to Bali we read a lot about dirty beaches. Well the beaches from Nusa Dua are simply breathtaking and beautiful. We walked along a few hotels and all beaches were clean. No worries and have a great stay.
review: recent visit bali read lot dirty beach well beach nusa dua simply breathtaking beautiful walk along hotel beach clean worry great stay

Content: One of the few beaches, where you get natural waves big enough for surfing.Need to be careful though as there are no life guards and the waves can be deceptive
review: one beach natural wave big enough surfingneed careful though life guard wave deceptive

Content: The Nusa Dua Beach is a big and clean beach arround the great Hotels in Nusa Dua. Unfortunately, when it rains, the sea flushes garbage to the beach. The garbage in hole is generally a big Problem. The Hotel staffs are effort to clean the beach as it is possible.
review: nusa dua big clean arround great hotel nusa dua unfortunately rain sea flush garbage garbage hole generally big problem hotel staff effort clean possible

Content: Nusa Dua beach is very clean, quiet and private location. There is a variety of water sports to do. Its a great spot to relax in the sun.
review: nusa dua clean quiet private location variety water sport great spot relax sun

Content: Would advise wearing water shoes as witnessed a lady in pain from having stood on a sea urchin.  The beach was ok but I wouldn't rave about it.
review: advise wear water shoe witness lady pain stand sea urchin ok wouldnt rave

Content: We spent 3 weeks in Bali and more than one week in Nusa Dua. The best part of beach can be found next to Ayodya Hotel. They have public entrance and you can rent towel over there. Beach area is daily maintained included a toilet, shower and beach bar facilities. Yes, it is not California beach but the best what you can found over there. Enjoy!
review: spent 3 week bali one week nusa dua best part find next ayodya hotel public entrance rent towel area daily maintain included toilet shower bar facility yes california best find enjoy

Content: Cloud be awesome. Except for the trash.Good transparency Great temperature Nice sandBut... trash. I had to walk a while to find a nice area and enjoy the amazing sea.In front of my hotel, was difficult
review: cloud awesome except trashgood transparency great temperature nice sandbut trash walk find nice area enjoy amaze seain front hotel difficult

Content: It is a big public beach with a long stretch. Some nice resorts along it but none actually owns any parts of it. The beach is quite dirty, and so is the water, with plastics and disgusting rubbish everywhere. Since the beach is public, no one is accountable for the cleaning of the beach. I won't come back to this one for sure.
review: big public long stretch nice resort along none actually own part quite dirty water plastic disgust rubbish everywhere public one accountable clean wont come back one sure

Content: The sand was ok. Indonesian is a populous country, so there is a lot of detritus in the sea. They had beach cleaners doing there best, but compared to Hawaii, or the Caribbean, its not that inviting so swim in. OK for sunbathing.
review: sand ok indonesian populous country lot detritus sea cleaner best compare hawaii caribbean invite swim ok sunbathing

Content: We are lucky, Today i Went to this place to refresh my mind luckly we got extra placeIt is Nusa Dua Light FestivalIt was amazing for usNusa Dua is very recommended place for holiday.
review: lucky today go place refresh mind luckly get extra placeit nusa dua light festivalit amaze usnusa dua recommend place holiday

Content: Playa Del Carman is far more beautiful.  As is the Napoli coast in Kauai.  But the jet skiing and parasailing is ridiculously cheap.  Great place to stay for a brief down time after a long flight to Bali.  But then go to Ubud.  That’s where it’s authentic.
review: playa del carman far beautiful napoli coast kauai jet ski parasailing ridiculously cheap great place stay brief time long flight bali go ubud thats authentic

Content: Miles of white sandy beach alongside crystal clear blue water.  Direct access from our hotel, St. Regis, made this wonderful beach easily assessable.
review: mile white sandy alongside crystal clear blue water direct access hotel st regis make wonderful easily assessable

Content: It was a bit windy but generally nice. It had plastics around the beach and some seaweeds. There were alot of people in the area. The showers were turned off adter 5 pm...
review: bit windy generally nice plastic around seaweed alot people area shower turn adter 5 pm

Content: Clean, comfortable and relaxing beach equiped with an recliner and small table for your food. Stall on the beach to order your food with its bar to order drinks and another stall for beach clothing purchases right there on beach.
review: clean comfortable relaxing equip recliner small table food stall order food bar order drink another stall clothing purchase right

Content: Very clean with lots to do, able to have a good walk along with no issues. Best time for me to go is early in the morning the sun rise is great with no one trying to sell you anything
review: clean lot able good walk along issue best time go early morning sun rise great one try sell anything

Content: This is the most common place for people visiting BALI and looking to go for beach activities and water sports. Not quite far from the airport and offers most of the major activities. It has a Turtle Island visit which we took as we were with kids. Here you can hold sea turtles and get up close with them. It is a very beach so if you are looking to relax and quiet then not the place to be
review: common place people visit bali look go activity water sport quite far airport offer major activity turtle island visit take kid hold sea turtle close look relax quiet place

Content: Bali beachs arnt the cleanest in the world. The resorts make some effyto clean up 5heir own beaches with teams of men with rakes but there is so much in the water constantly coming in that when you do go for a swim you will end up with some plastic bag or other rubbish on you. My husband collected a bag of rubbish every day we went to the beach. There were many offering bamboo baskets on the beach everyday that are just left there.
review: bali beach arnt clean world resort make effyto clean 5heir beach team men rake much water constantly come go swim will end plastic bag rubbish husband collect bag rubbish every day go many offering bamboo basket everyday leave

Content: Low tide when we were there but overall nice beach. You can check out the dining option at the bay and the beach club
review: low tide overall nice check din option bay club

Content: We stayed at the Laguna resort and the beach directly outside the hotel was very well kept all day long. Nice sun lounges and a beautiful view.
review: stay laguna resort directly outside hotel well keep day long nice sun lounge beautiful view

Content: Went to see the temple. Unfortunately, it is off - limit to the public. However, at the beach you see a fabulous rock formation. The location is very good for relaxing. Also has nice view for sunset. A very calming place.
review: go see temple unfortunately limit public see fabulous rock formation location good relaxing nice view sunset calm place

Content: It’s the beach with white sandy beach and the wave is average not too crazy so we still can swim and play in the hotel. Bot to crowded beach and there are some luxury hotel located in this beach area
review: white sandy wave average crazy still swim play hotel bot crowd luxury hotel locate area

Content: Large swathes of sandy beaches which are largely carved up by the various resorts which to larger or smaller extents have staked a claim for the portion of beach in front of their resort. Access permitted to these beaches is controlled by the resort to various degrees. You are free, however, to stroll along the pathway between the resorts and the beaches should you wish. The beaches themselves are well maintained with a plethora of sun lounges and cabanas on or close to the beaches.
review: large swathe sandy beach largely carve various resort large small extent stake claim portion front resort access permit beach control resort various degree free stroll along pathway resort beach wish beach well maintain plethora sun lounge cabanas close beach

Content: Bar far the best beach in Bali. Contained in a gated community, it is unlike any where else in Bali. Very clean and very well kept with manicured gardens.
review: bar far best bali contain gate community unlike bali clean well keep manicure garden

Content: This was our first trip to Bali.. I had an apprehension that it will be jam-packed with tourists with no place to breath!The Nusa Dua beach turned out to be fantastic! Absolutely clean, family oriented, not at all crowded and very well maintained by all the resorts nearby.Magically serene....
review: first trip bali apprehension will jampack tourist place breaththe nusa dua turn fantastic absolutely clean family orient crowd well maintain resort nearbymagically serene

Content: The beach is clean, plenty of beach chairs- watersports. not massive waves. we had a lovely time at the beach during our week long stay
review: clean plenty chair watersports massive wave lovely time week long stay

Content: A calm and nice beach that is cleaned every day and well taken care of which is very important when traveling to Bali because of the plastic nightmare on most beaches :(
review: calm nice clean every day well take care important travel bali plastic nightmare beach

Content: Both sand and shore are hard to walk/swim as they are very rocky and hurt your feet. I personally liked Seminyak beaches more.
review: sand shore hard walkswim rocky hurt foot personally like seminyak beach

Content: As i have visited many countries along with beaches, in which i loved the most was mauritius but in comparison with it nisa dua beach along to my sofitel resorts in bali at nusa dua are also very neat and clean ...and the shores and silence of sand make our trip more awesome
review: visit many country along beach love mauritius comparison nisa dua along sofitel resort bali nusa dua neat clean shore silence sand make trip awesome

Content: We walked along the sea front several times in a 12 days there. Absolutely beautiful! The water was lovely, i do recommend people wear shoes of some sort as the sand doea get pretty hot by midday. There is lots to explore and see. Amazing restaurant all along the beach front. Local venders selling locally made items, cheaper than the shops. You may even come across a few activities specialists offering snorkeling, boat hire, wind surfing and so much more. I absolutely loved while i was just sitting waist deep in the water that i could see hundreds of little fish. It was amazing!
review: walk along sea front several time 12 day absolutely beautiful water lovely recommend people wear shoes sort sand doea pretty hot midday lot explore see amazing restaurant along front local vender sell locally make item cheap shop may even come across activity specialist offer snorkel boat hire wind surf much absolutely love sit waist deep water see hundred little fish amazing

Content: Maybe one of the best beach in Nusa Dua or in Bali facing Southeast. It's quite long, not very crowded and the sand it's clean thanks to most of the staff from the hotel resorts. Seen some plastic in the water but not as many as in some other places close by. Will come back!!!
review: maybe one best nusa dua bali face southeast quite long crowded sand clean thanks staff hotel resort see plastic water many place close will come back

Content: Open clean and very cool beach. Beach outside Grand Hyatt is very picturesque. Well worth a visit. A nice change from sitting beside a boring hot swimming pool.
review: open clean cool outside grand hyatt picturesque well worth visit nice change sit beside bore hot swimming pool

Content: The current in May change this beach into a bit of a garbage dump with plastics and garbage washing up from who knows where. The staff at the resorts rake the sands but the water is still a bit iffy.just what happens in May
review: current may change bit garbage dump plastic garbage wash know staff resort rake sand water still bit iffyjust happens may

Content: I have visited there in Feb 2018. I had stayed in Nusa Dua for 2Nights at Grand Hyatt. I had a direct access to the beach from my resort. The beach was clean and safe to walk around. The sand was little brownish in colour and clean. The view was amazing with low tides. It is far better than Kuta Beach. The place is so clam and excellent for relaxation. The place was having less crowd. Due to less crowd the beach may be boring for some people. Must visit beach.
review: visit feb 2018 stay nusa dua 2nights grand hyatt direct access resort clean safe walk around sand little brownish colour clean view amaze low tide far well kuta place clam excellent relaxation place less crowd due less crowd may bore people must visit

Content: Nusa Dua beach is very good for water sports activities. . U get all kinds of watersports ranging from sea walking, scuba diving, parasailing, jet sking etc. .if u are visiting from other countries book online for packages and go for cheaper prices. . At location they are very costly. . They accept indonesian rupiah as well as US dollars. .
review: nusa dua good water sport activity u kind watersports range sea walk scuba dive parasailing jet sking etc u visit country book online package go cheap price location costly accept indonesian rupiah well u dollar

Content: Stunning beach! Beautiful and clean and each resort does a sweep daily to help keep it maintained. We had a great time.
review: stun beautiful clean resort sweep daily help keep maintain great time

Content: One of the best beach in Bali beautiful beach and white sand make it more attractive. I advise to visit this place once, you love it!
review: one best bali beautiful white sand make attractive advise visit place love

Content: been there with my family, it is really good beach having clear blue water and nice view, had a bar around nice to spend 2-3 hours with family...
review: family really good clear blue water nice view bar around nice spend 23 hour family

Content: Nusa Dua is a vast and long beach, so quiet and beautiful, BUT the water in the ocean is full of plastics, papers and rubbish. What a pity, we used the swimming pool only because of the water pollution. Local say that the wastes are coming from the neighboring island Lombock. Whatever is the reason it is an unpleasant fact and significantly will repel the tourists.
review: nusa dua vast long quiet beautiful water ocean full plastic paper rubbish pity use swim pool water pollution local say waste come neighbor island lombock whatever reason unpleasant fact significantly will repel tourist

Content: The beach in front of the resorts is mostly very nice however rubbish continues to be washed ashore by the ocean. This requires ongoing maintenance and unfortunately most tourists do not assist. If everyone was to pick up a piece of rubbish every time they walk on the beach then the problem would be solved until the government and the resorts take further action on minimizing plastic use and educating the locals and tourists about the proper disposing of waste.
review: front resort mostly nice rubbish continue wash ashore ocean require ongoing maintenance unfortunately tourists assist everyone pick piece rubbish every time walk problem solve government resort take action minimize plastic use educate local tourist proper dispose waste

Content: You will find it is so enjoyable to be on the fine sandy beach and it is so gentle and smooth that you will almost forget how far you have walked, very pretty.
review: will find enjoyable fine sandy gentle smooth will almost forget far walked pretty

Content: There may be parts of this beach where you can swim. But the huge areas near our Ritz-Carlton hotel certainly aren’t suitable. The tide goes out so far that in the mornings the swimming area starts a long way away and in the afternoon it’s too shallow for too far.
review: may part swim huge area near ritzcarlton hotel certainly arent suitable tide go far morning swim area start long way away afternoon shallow far

Content: Lovely sand and not too many touts. I suppose the price paid for the hotel chains located along nusa Dua goes toward the mintainence of the beach including the litter management. A great beach for young children.
review: lovely sand many tout suppose price pay hotel chain locate along nusa dua go toward mintainence include litter management great young child

Content: Great for a walk or evening stroll. You can walk right along the beach and past all the resorts and hotels. Snorkeling and swimming is good around here and surfboard hire and watersports can be arranged on the beach.
review: great walk even stroll walk right along past resort hotel snorkel swim good around surfboard hire watersports arrange

Content: Without a lot in the way of foliage, this beach is hot. It is very clean, however with gentle waves but don't expect to walk anywhere to see other properties...we were at a large resort property (Mulia) which owned the beach area for a good distance.
review: without lot way foliage hot clean gentle wave dont expect walk anywhere see propertieswe large resort property mulia own area good distance

Content: Beautiful beach, local workers try to keep clean but unfortunately plastic does come in via the sea. Very quiet when we visited, the sellers were respectful and didn’t hassle you. The beach is sand, wide and very long, just gorgeous. Jet skis, etc for hire. Had the most fabulous massage on beach, haggle well! 💕
review: beautiful local worker try keep clean unfortunately plastic come via sea quiet visited seller respectful didnt hassle sand wide long gorgeous jet ski etc hire fabulous massage haggle well

Content: Lovely beach but tide goes out very fast after 1pm. Lots of beach hawkers always trying to sell you tat but always polite when you refuse
review: lovely tide go fast 1pm lot hawker always try sell tat always polite refuse

Content: We visited the beach everyday on our 4 day stay.The beach was clean and you were not hassled.Just be careful as currents were very strong.
review: visit everyday 4 day staythe clean hassledjust careful current strong

Content: It was ok but the boats and jet skis kept interrupting where we were lounging. When low tide happens it becomes too shallow and you kinda get stuck with seaweed portions. Overall it was a relaxing beach.
review: ok boat jet skis kept interrupt lounge low tide happen becomes shallow kinda stick seaweed portion overall relaxing

Content: The beach looks very nice but is not suitable for swimming ,tides goes way out , nice to walk through
review: look nice suitable swim tide go way nice walk

Content: This beach has probably the best teal water on the island, offering stunning views and also has a cycling road that allows you to take a ride around the place while not only enjoying the breeze but also getting to see the whole scenic place in a short time.
review: probably best teal water island offer stunning view cycle road allows take ride around place enjoy breeze get see whole scenic place short time

Content: Just stunning , beautiful sands clear safe waters and friendly staffFronted by various high grade hotels so immaculately clean
review: stun beautiful sand clear safe water friendly stafffronted various high grade hotel immaculately clean

Content: clear blue waters and relatively less crowded beach. Nusa Dua is better than other more touristy beaches of Bali
review: clear blue water relatively less crowded nusa dua well touristy beach bali

Content: We have visited once before and this time round we fully enjoyed the beach. Beautiful soft sands, shallow waters, although the waves do crash down further out. It’s amazing to watch!
review: visited time round fully enjoy beautiful soft sand shallow water although wave crash amazing watch

Content: One of the cleanest beaches in Bali calm , golden sands and crystal water Most of the hotels at nusa dua has their private beaches But still you can access even if you are not hotel guest
review: one cleanest beach bali calm golden sand crystal water hotel nusa dua private beach still access even hotel guest

Content: Long beach gently shelving into the sea which is much calmer on this east side of the island. Sand is fairly coarse but good for walking on. Catch the sunrise early in the morning or take a long walk about 6pm when it gets cooler. Plenty of eating choices in the string of hotels that go along the length
review: long gently shelve sea much calmer east side island sand fairly coarse good walking catch sunrise early morning take long walk 6pm get cool plenty eat choice string hotel go along length

Content: You can enjoy the day under the trees on a sunbed and the breeze off the ocean is very pleasant, waiters will serve on you so no need to move!
review: enjoy day tree sunbed breeze ocean pleasant waiter will serve need move

Content: Very clean spectacular beach. Safe for swimming with a gentle shelf and small waves. There are places to eat along the beach although most hotels have their own area with sun beds amongst the trees.
review: clean spectacular safe swimming gentle shelf small wave place eat along although hotel area sun bed amongst tree

Content: Our hotel fronted onto this section of nusa dua beach with lots of other 5 star resorts also fronting this stretch in between the large statue and the pier. Either side is different - one side was dominated by water sports and had quite a few lots of floating rubbish in the sea, the other side (Bali beach) was a lot quieter with a few bars and places to eat - all in all three stretches of beach that differed quite a lot
review: hotel front onto section nusa dua lot 5 star resort front stretch large statue pier either side different one side dominate water sport quite lot float rubbish sea side bali lot quiet bar place eat three stretch differ quite lot

Content: Nice surprise - beautiful beach that is not crowded, beach was clean as hotels hire staff to clean the beaches.  White sand, clear water and no buskers.
review: nice surprise beautiful crowd clean hotel hire staff clean beach white sand clear water busker

Content: This beach came directly off our pool area. Its a lovely safe beach - spotlessly clean - and lots of water sports available.
review: come directly pool area lovely safe spotlessly clean lot water sport available

Content: We hired a driver to go to Nusa Dua Beach for a couple of hours. Not a very secluded beach but still nice with white sand and sun chairs and food for a fair cost.
review: hire driver go nusa dua couple hour seclude still nice white sand sun chair food fair cost

Content: The best thing about the Hilton resort Nusa Dua was the beach!  Absolutely beautiful!  And also the wild monkeys on the property.
review: best thing hilton resort nusa dua absolutely beautiful wild monkey property

Content: Visited the beach and felt very safe and the walk to the blow holes was out of this worldGreat places to eat and drinkLots of security but very friendly
review: visit felt safe walk blow hole worldgreat place eat drinklots security friendly

Content: We stayed at the Club Med Bali resort in Nusa Dua and walked along the beach past a number of resorts and hotels lining the beach to the south of Club Med. We found the beach here to be cleaner and less crowded than Kuta beach.
review: stay club med bali resort nusa dua walk along past number resort hotel line south club med find clean less crowded kuta

Content: Chain of luxury hotels along the beach, but open for public as well,there is an area where you can borrow beach sun lounger and chairs for a minimum fee. But beware if you’re ordering refreshments because as per my experience they tend to overprice on your bill to get some kickback. Good for water sports.The waves were high and strong when I went there so I didn’t enjoy swimming that much but maybe it was good for surfing and other activities.
review: chain luxury hotel along open public wellthere area borrow sun lounger chair minimum fee beware youre order refreshment per experience tend overprice bill kickback good water sportsthe wave high strong go didnt enjoy swim much maybe good surfing activity

Content: Very beautiful place. One of the cleaner beaches in Bali. I stayed at a resort just down from a public area and it was so beautiful. Strong current in that area I don’t know if I would think to swim there.
review: beautiful place one cleaner beach bali stay resort public area beautiful strong current area dont know think swim

Content: Nice and long beach stretching some kilometers. Two dozens resort hotel are located on this beach with many more on the interior. We are in May and the wind blowing strong causing big waves crashing on the beach. Do not expect this beach to be like the one in the Caribean. Like anywhere, there are some ambulant vendors selling stuffs but they all belong ti a local coop and with not bother you at all. On the beach restaurants of hotels sells tasty food.
review: nice long stretch kilometer two dozen resort hotel locate many interior may wind blow strong cause big wave crash expect one caribean anywhere ambulant vendor sell stuff belong ti local coop bother restaurant hotel sell tasty food

Content: The reason this beach is thought of the best by a lot of people is the strip of luxury hotels that are situated here. The other beaches on the peninsula, like Queen beach at Jimbaran, Pandawa beach in the South and probably the other in the West is that a lot of the luxury hotels are here. Good choice, but if you just want to sit at the beach and dive into the waves, the others are to me equally good, they are just lacking the luxury. See other reviews too.Easy to reach from Jimbaran or Kuta, just rent a motorbike and drive along the by pass. Can't miss.
review: reason think best lot people strip luxury hotel situate beach peninsula queen jimbaran pandawa south probably west lot luxury hotel good choice want sit dive wave others equally good lacking luxury see review tooeasy reach jimbaran kuta rent motorbike drive along pas cant miss

Content: Beautiful beach as compare to most beaches at Bali. We stayed at the Westin Resort at Nusa Dua. Which front the beach with other resorts. Found beach to be clean and protected. Good spot for young kids as the water depth is shallow. Water is mostly clear. Not a good place to snorkel as there is not much to look at except for sea grass. Nice anyway👍
review: beautiful compare beach bali stay westin resort nusa dua front resort find clean protected good spot young kid water depth shallow water mostly clear good place snorkel much look except sea grass nice anyway

Content: not only the beautiful beach, it is also a great place to jog! I regularly go there for jogging and it is absolutely fun.
review: beautiful great place jog regularly go jog absolutely fun

Content: Beautiful beach. Wi would compare to Seychelles and Maldives where I have also been but for fraction of price
review: beautiful wi compare seychelles maldives fraction price

Content: Pretty beach, not too much pollution. Selected hotels have cleared the rubbish out the front. Very windy this time of year, which is lovely for the breeze but you don’t get the crystal clear calm photos you see in the pictures. Had a massage in the middle of the day, surprisingly didn’t drown in sweat.
review: pretty much pollution select hotel clear rubbish front windy time year lovely breeze dont crystal clear calm photo see picture massage middle day surprisingly didnt drown sweat

Content: The beach seems clean at first sight, but after you get into the water, you can see garbage in the ocean. I was a little bit disappointed because I traveled very far to visit this place. There were many cleaner and nicer beaches in the Caribbean (Coki each in St..thomas, Virgin Gorda in Tortola, Little Bay in St. Marteen) or in Hawaii( Lanikai, Hanauma Bay) or in Bermuda (Horseshoe Bay). In order to keep the beach clean, everyone should take their garbage with them ir throw it in the garbage bins. Also, Bali should place garbage bins in the area.  I don't recall any garbage bin in the area.  The Bali government should implement some programs to clean the garbage in the ocean, in long term, people might stop visiting this place due to the amount of garbages.
review: seem clean first sight water see garbage ocean little bit disappointed travel far visit place many clean nice beach caribbean coki stthomas virgin gorda tortola little bay st marteen hawaii lanikai hanauma bay bermuda horseshoe bay order keep clean everyone take garbage ir throw garbage bin bali place garbage bin area dont recall garbage bin area bali government implement program clean garbage ocean long term people might stop visit place due amount garbage

Content: We enjoyed Nusa Dua beach at Hilton Hotel Nusa Dua, it was breathtaking. The sound of wave could put us to sleep as we lay down on the beach. It is relaxing and peaceful. The beach is clean with white sands.
review: enjoy nusa dua hilton hotel nusa dua breathtaking sound wave put u sleep lay relax peaceful clean white sand

Content: The pristine white sand in front of the Laguna welcomes you to have breakfast lunch or dinner or even happy hour right there on or next to the sand
review: pristine white sand front laguna welcome breakfast lunch dinner even happy hour right next sand

Content: Whitish brownish sand beach. Very clean & perfect spot to spend your honeymoon. It is not crowded & very clean. Use to love sipping coconut water & enjoy the sea & view. Simply wow
review: whitish brownish sand clean perfect spot spend honeymoon crowd clean use love sip coconut water enjoy sea view simply wow

Content: Second time stay and more than impressed with the service and facilities provided. Special mention to Jeany an absolute Gem to the Sofitel, such a gorgeous soul, nothing is too much for her, no ask too great; our children absolutely adore her, as do we! Pool access room an absolutely must, who doesn't want a private pool at their convenience anytime of the day or night ! The tropical gardens are impecable and nothing like we have experienced at any other hotel! Absolutley in lush green tropical garden heaven! The food is A++ catering for every pallet, room service is hands down the best we've encountered from pillow requests to ice, anything you desire is not too much to ask! Rivera lunch is Ah-mazing!! No wonder so many tourists book from other resorts here just for this once a week feast its to die for! We love it!!We are back in 16 weeks 3rd time round and cannot wait! Keep up the good good nothing to fault so far! See you back in Sep!
review: second time stay impressed service facility provide special mention jeany absolute gem sofitel gorgeous soul nothing much ask great child absolutely adore pool access room absolutely must doesnt want private pool convenience anytime day night tropical garden impecable nothing experienced hotel absolutley lush green tropical garden heaven food cater every pallet room service hand best weve encounter pillow request ice anything desire much ask rivera lunch ahmazing wonder many tourist book resort week feast die love itwe back 16 week 3rd time round wait keep good good nothing fault far see back sep

Content: Beware of beach peddlers selling fake silver jewellery. As a retired jeweller we enjoyed a great time at Nusa Dua beach apart from being ripped off from the beach sellers. We bought 3 bangles stamped with 925 (sterling silver mark) they weighed the correct weight only to find they were heavy silver plate over brass. The price paid was 25% over the silver bullion price, so ok didn't lose much money. These beach sellers say they are controlled by Bali tourism & have a number on with yellow jacket  JUST TELL THEM "NO THANK YOU"
review: beware peddler sell fake silver jewellery retire jeweller enjoy great time nusa dua apart rip seller buy 3 bangle stamp 925 sterling silver mark weigh correct weight find heavy silver plate brass price pay 25 silver bullion price ok didnt lose much money seller say control bali tourism number yellow jacket tell thank

Content: The outer reef protects the beach. The ocean becomes a set of tidal pools at low tide, with many interesting marine creatures to discover (but it also means you can't swim or do other watersports half the time).At high tide, not much to see when snorkeling from the beach.The sand is rather coarse. Hotel staff keep the beach quite clean. There is a convenient walking/jogging path along the beach.Lack of non-hotel restaurants unfortunately (but look for Pirates Bay restaurant, highly recommended!)
review: outer reef protect ocean becomes set tidal pool low tide many interesting marine creature discover mean cant swim watersports half timeat high tide much see snorkel beachthe sand rather coarse hotel staff keep quite clean convenient walkingjogging path along beachlack nonhotel restaurant unfortunately look pirate bay restaurant highly recommend

Content: location is very good and really beautiful. I think every beach in Nusa Dua is just wonderful and definitely worth to visit.
review: location good really beautiful think every nusa dua wonderful definitely worth visit

Content: Because we are here in the off season the beaches were basically empty, which was fine for us. The sand was well groomed.
review: season beach basically empty fine u sand well groom

Content: We stayed at the Anaya Resort Friendly staff lovely placeBut the food could do with an upgrade , there is plenty for breakfast depending on taste and culture We had a meal in the Restaurant the other night and payed $180 aus and the steak was tough , we also ordered fries with our meal and they came out after we finished the steaks
review: stay anaya resort friendly staff lovely placebut food upgrade plenty breakfast depend taste culture meal restaurant night pay 180 aus steak tough order fry meal come finish steak

Content: Nusa Dua Bali beach is a long public beach which you can walk along There are many food stalls, massage stalls, vendors, restaurants and hotels along the shore. The beach  has some nice areas but mostly it is full of plastic bottles, plastic bags, odd flip flops, sea grass. Not areas are created equal!! Dogs wander on the beach as well they are harmless.
review: nusa dua bali long public walk along many food stall massage stall vendor restaurant hotel along shore nice area mostly full plastic bottle plastic bag odd flip flop sea grass area create equal dog wander well harmless

Content: The beach was very dirty we actually spent time picking up garbage that floated in with the tire. Not a surf beach but good for swimming if you don't mind swimming in plastic garbage.
review: dirty actually spent time pick garbage float tire surf good swimming dont mind swim plastic garbage

Content: Coast is amazing with long sendy beach and beautifull plant and threes whos give deep shadow. Many resort with pool and garden. You can hire sunbeds in resort for 20 euro per person and you got towel and you can use pool. You can hire sunbeds outside resort for 7 euro per 3 hrs per person and you got towel and shower. Hughe minus is dirty sea with plastic, paper, naylon bags etc...on this beach waves not so big.
review: coast amazing long sendy beautifull plant three whos give deep shadow many resort pool garden hire sunbeds resort 20 euro per person get towel use pool hire sunbeds outside resort 7 euro per 3 hr per person get towel shower hughe minus dirty sea plastic paper naylon bag etcon wave big

Content: Nice beach to visit in the evenings. During morning, it would be too hot with sun shining above you, unless you wish to sunbathe, avoid visiting during many ending hours.
review: nice visit evening morning hot sun shin unless wish sunbathe avoid visit many end hour

Content: The beach itself is fabulous and the see a beautiful blue colour. There aren't many rocks either but it is tidal so in the afternoon the water is really far back. Best to get your swimming in earlier in the day. There is also a small plastic waste problem but the staff are doing their best to clear it away.
review: fabulous see beautiful blue colour arent many rock either tidal afternoon water really far back best swimming earlier day small plastic waste problem staff best clear away

Content: Beautiful beach. Lovely sand and nice water, but dirty. Even the staff is trying to clean up every day. Is not very nice to swim in it.
review: beautiful lovely sand nice water dirty even staff try clean every day nice swim

Content: This beach is with a lovely view and a perfect spot for seeing the sunrise. Seeing the waves break out by the reef is beautiful in sunrise. The biggest problem with the beach is all the trash, both in the water and on the beach itself. The resorts along the beach employ beach cleaners that mostly rake together that trash and then dig a hole and throw it in there. This results in a clean beach for a couple of hours until the tide  washes out these “trash holes” again. This way of handling the trash results in it being washed out into the ocean again, unfortunately.
review: lovely view perfect spot see sunrise see wave break reef beautiful sunrise big problem trash water resort along employ cleaner mostly rake together trash dig hole throw result clean couple hour tide wash trash hole way handle trash result wash ocean unfortunately

Content: Nusa Dua Beach is safe, clean and family friendly.  We enjoyed the stroll along the water.Not suitable for surfers
review: nusa dua safe clean family friendly enjoy stroll along waternot suitable surfer

Content: Beautiful sand that makes me want to go back. You have to looking around with bicycle and enjoying the scenery !
review: beautiful sand make want go back look around bicycle enjoy scenery

Content: We've been to many Bali beaches but love this one. It's clean, great to walk, swim and play, easy to walk in and great for kids.
review: weve many bali beach love one clean great walk swim play easy walk great kid

Content: Great place to relax and have a swim, very reminiscent of the beaches back home..Easy beach to take youngsters too..Take a dip, you’ll love it🏝
review: great place relax swim reminiscent beach back homeeasy take youngster tootake dip youll love

Content: It's a good beach to look at. But at low tide, the water is very shallow and you have to go out for about 200 meters to get enough depth to swim. There are many sharp rocks below water. Wearing beach footwear is advised.
review: good look low tide water shallow go 200 meter enough depth swim many sharp rock water wear footwear advise

Content: A nice beach to spend a lazy day at. Not so crowded and quite and good. We'll worth spending some time at..
review: nice spend lazy day crowd quite good well worth spending time

Content: Nice beach but slope is rather steep with unconsolidated coarse sand - so hard to walk along the beach without sinking to the ankles ( maybe beech was artificially created.)
review: nice slope rather steep unconsolidated coarse sand hard walk along without sink ankle maybe beech artificially create

Content: Not too hot because of a lovely breeze from the sea. Lots of staff clearing the seaweed and bits from the sea and sand constantly . Very relaxing, Not over crowded when we were there and places to get cheap but good drinks and food. Absolutely amazing scenery and a temple which is only a short walk away.
review: hot lovely breeze sea lots staff clear seaweed bit sea sand constantly relax crowd place cheap good drink food absolutely amazing scenery temple short walk away

Content: The Beach is very clean with surfs. The under current is bit strong, so one has to be careful when entering water.
review: clean surf current bit strong one careful entering water

Content: A little bit of rubbish in the water but generally clean and clear. The locals are always out cleaning as apposed some of the other beaches in Bali. Highly recommend.
review: little bit rubbish water generally clean clear local always clean apposed beach bali highly recommend

Content: We visited Nusa Dua beach while at the Westin Hotel . The beach was okay , sandy but in the mornings a lot of seaweed and debris was accumulated on the beach . This was a little disappointing as the hotel and grounds were excellent .
review: visit nusa dua westin hotel okay sandy morning lot seaweed debris accumulate little disappointing hotel ground excellent

Content: beautiful beach and setting few bars dotted about and some hawkers about but not a pain like some can be shame about the sea hope its not a regular occurrence
review: beautiful set bar dot hawker pain shame sea hope regular occurrence

Content: This beach is situated in Nusa Dua which is only 15 min away from the Bali airport at Depensar. It has a few large and swanky resorts. The one we chose was call Ayodya hotel which I discovered was on the best and cleanest part of this beach. Visitors from the other hotels walk over to this part of the beach. Ayodya was amazing, but way too large for us. Good for a few nights only. Souvenir shopping just outside the hotel on the main drag is amazing. Prices are cheap so feel free to buy all your gifts there! We traveled everywhere after that and found out later. Great restaurant selection outside. Beach in this area is very polluted which is unfortunate... if you can look aside the garbage, it’s a true blue glittering gem of an ocean here! White sandy beaches and hot sun! Enjoy!
review: situate nusa dua 15 min away bali airport depensar large swanky resort one chose call ayodya hotel discover best clean part visitor hotel walk part ayodya amaze way large u good night souvenir shop outside hotel main drag amaze price cheap feel free buy gift travel everywhere find later great restaurant selection outside area pollute unfortunate look aside garbage true blue glitter gem ocean white sandy beach hot sun enjoy

Content: Nusa Dua is nice and quiet compared to other areas. Best swimming is on the high tide, sand beautiful and not crowded.
review: nusa dua nice quiet compare area best swim high tide sand beautiful crowd

Content: Definitely the better place to go in Bali the rest of them were not great. As soon as we arrived here it was calm no cab drivers hassling you well a couple at the front but that was all. The beach was bliss nice cafes not over populated and really pleasant we got to swim in the ocean. No Rubbish at this beach which was great as the others in Bali let it down.great little bar you don’t need to take too much as it’s all there. It was clean and well kept. Loved the fact security were there it filters out the crap. Worth a visit.
review: definitely well place go bali rest great soon arrive calm cab driver hassle well couple front bliss nice cafe populate really pleasant get swim ocean rubbish great others bali let downgreat little bar dont need take much clean well keep love fact security filter crap worth visit

Content: It is my first visit to Bali and I am in chock! The ocean is so dirty with floating rubbish I do not want my children to enter the beach or the water. The hotels are trying to keep the beach clean but it is a fight they can not win - the ocean is completely polluted and it breaks my heart to see what we have done to the planet.
review: first visit bali chock ocean dirty float rubbish want child enter water hotel try keep clean fight win ocean completely pollute break heart see do planet

Content: We were so disappointed when we walked down to the sea from the beach club. Glass bottles, plastic straws, bags and packaging along the shoreline and lots floating in the sea.Another hotel resident found a medical needle washed up too!!The rubbish on the beach stayed there the whole week as we visited the beach twice and nothing had changed.These big name hotel chains using the beach really need to keep the beach clean and safe for their guests as they are advertising their wonderful beach clubs. It was a very sad situation.
review: disappointed walk sea club glass bottle plastic straw bag package along shoreline lot float seaanother hotel resident find medical needle wash toothe rubbish stay whole week visit twice nothing changedthese big name hotel chain use really need keep clean safe guest advertise wonderful club sad situation

Content: Very nice to walk along past some other very nice hotels and you may also see a couple of weddings along the way
review: nice walk along past nice hotel may see couple wedding along way

Content: A nice clean long beach with a few places to sit and eat or drink there are a few high end hotels that back onto the beach so their chairs etc are out of bounds but there are some you can rent .the beach itself is very nice with nice white sand and crystal clear water great for a swim
review: nice clean long place sit eat drink high end hotel back onto chair etc bound rent nice nice white sand crystal clear water great swim

Content: Beautiful beach shame about the debris. Made a nice change from the hotel pool and some resorts organise daily beach activities,
review: beautiful shame debris make nice change hotel pool resort organise daily activity

Content: Nusa Dua beach should be visited in evenings or mornings. Great place to walk ,jog and even participate in Yoga organized by hotel during mornings.You need to register first at desk
review: nusa dua visit evening morning great place walk jog even participate yoga organize hotel morningsyou need register first desk

Content: Beautiful beach, but the plastic is just awful. We saw dirty nappies, plastic bottles and even asthma inhalers in the water. The hotels try to do their best by cleaning up the beach but it is an impossible task.Bali has to get ahead of their plastic problem before it is irreversible
review: beautiful plastic awful saw dirty nappy plastic bottle even asthma inhaler water hotel try best clean impossible taskbali ahead plastic problem irreversible

Content: Quite a lot of plastic debris is in the corners in the northern section of the beaches but I guess that's normal in most places these days unfortunately. It is a good quality Beach apart from that with a nice surf Clearwater and a nice breeze coming off the sea.
review: quite lot plastic debris corner northern section beach guess thats normal place day unfortunately good quality apart nice surf clearwater nice breeze come sea

Content: Growing up in an area back home with the beach at our door this beach has a more tropical feel about it. Please note some of the beaches are private and belong to the resort that it is next to. Saying this a lot of the beaches are for the public. After a visit to Seminyak beach Nusa Dua was much cleaner with minimal litter lining the beach. For a small fee you can access a lot of the private beaches with chair and umbrella hire as well as surf boards and other water crafts. If you do get a chance have a go at snorkeling, with a few easy to access reef it is great for first timers.
review: grow area back home door tropical feel please note beach private belong resort next say lot beach public visit seminyak nusa dua much clean minimal litter line small fee access lot private beach chair umbrella hire well surf board water craft chance go snorkel easy access reef great first timer

Content: It's my favorite stretch of beach with some nice resorts. I prefer the beaches here and the fact there is is a shopping center short distance away by taxi. There are some good restaurants and cafes in the shopping center as well. It's about 20 minutes from the bustle of Kuta and Jimbaran.
review: favorite stretch nice resort prefer beach fact shop center short distance away taxi good restaurant cafes shop center well 20 minute bustle kuta jimbaran

Content: This splendid white sand beach at the western edge of the enclave retains lots of the character that is missing in the santisied Nusa Dua resort zone. Generally safe for swimming and some beach side warungs. A large swathe of the Nusa Dua and Tanunj Benoa beachfront is connected via anice walking path, and morning walks here are especially recommended. The foothpath runs from just in front of the Ayodya Resort in the south for about 7 kms north to the Grand Mirage on the Tanunj Benoa spit. Nusa Dua offers many watersport activites such as banana boating, jetskiing, parasailing, scuba diving and so on.
review: splendid white sand western edge enclave retain lot character miss santisied nusa dua resort zone generally safe swim side warungs large swathe nusa dua tanunj benoa beachfront connect via anice walk path morning walk especially recommend foothpath run front ayodya resort south 7 km north grand mirage tanunj benoa spit nusa dua offer many watersport activites banana boat jetskiing parasailing scuba diving

Content: Lovely calm and clean beach. No hassles, water activities available. Great lounges and relaxing environment. Vendors on the beach were pleasant and respectful.
review: lovely calm clean hassle water activity available great lounge relax environment vendor pleasant respectful

Content: I'm an early bird that savours the more tranquil and less hot hours of the day and Nusa Dua Beach is like many others in Bali. Great and safe for swimming, though some times of the year you'll get waste washed up on the sands. This afflicts every beach but is not the case all year around.
review: im early bird savour tranquil less hot hour day nusa dua many others bali great safe swimming though time year youll waste wash sand afflict every case year around

Content: Been staying in Melia and Grand Hyatt Bali, both situated along the strips of Nusa Dua beach. Very calming atmosphere, less crowded compare to Kuta/sanur/seminyak beach. Most importantly is gentle waves so its save for our little one to play in the water. Love it.
review: stay melia grand hyatt bali situate along strip nusa dua calm atmosphere less crowded compare kutasanurseminyak importantly gentle wave save little one play water love

Content: you can choose Made. very good and shy local. does not try to upsell. my kids like him.this is his number: +62 852-3865-5766

Content: Not a real Bali if you won't go out from the resort.Well overpriced compared to reality of Bali but if you like luxury and reality of Bali overwhelming you, stay inside the bubble.
review: real bali wont go resortwell overprice compare reality bali luxury reality bali overwhelm stay inside bubble

Content: It’s a lovely beach, good for basics when you are by the beach. I only think, the hotels should get together and run cleaning campings. Also the local authorises should get involved. Sometimes you can see lots of plastic by the water and sand.  Think about the environment and the positives will bring having a clean beach.
review: lovely good basic think hotel together run clean camping local authorises involve sometimes see lots plastic water sand think environment positive will bring clean

Content: In some respects this is a great beach, in others it just doesn't work. It looks good with waves always breaking on the reef offshore. It has a large tidal reach with shallow water meaning that it you want to swim it is not possible at low tide when the water retreats maybe half a mile. The sand is also not particularly appealing and is not any good for kids and building sandcastles. As someone that likes to jog on the beach in the morning it was impossible as it is the type of sand that doesn't take any weight. However it is shallow and doesn't shelve and therefore it is a relatively safe beach for kids. The beach is lined by mostly hotels that all have their own loungers. There are some locals selling the usual touristy stuff but they are not aggressive and move on if ignored.
review: respect great others doesnt work looks good wave always break reef offshore large tidal reach shallow water meaning want swim possible low tide water retreat maybe half mile sand particularly appeal good kid building sandcastles someone like jog morning impossible type sand doesnt take weight shallow doesnt shelve relatively safe kid line mostly hotels lounger local sell usual touristy stuff aggressive move ignore

Content: Not always the case, as depends on the tides, the resorts  are always doing clean ups of seaweed & rubbish . Safe to swim & fun for  the kids once the tides goes out to poke around in the sheltered area ankle deep.
review: always case depend tide resort always clean ups seaweed rubbish safe swim fun kid tide go poke around sheltered area ankle deep

Content: Is a huge pity to have a wonderful place ruined like this :( The water is clear, hot temperature, the beach is beautiful but you at Inside an have plastic bottles and packages floating around... felt a great pity of how we ruin amazing natural landscapes like this.
review: huge pity wonderful place ruin water clear hot temperature beautiful inside plastic bottle package float around felt great pity ruin amaze natural landscape

Content: We enjoyed parasiling, scuba and jet ski... the place is just like any regular beach side, just that it was too crowded... underwater walk and scuba were a good experience though
review: enjoy parasiling scuba jet ski place regular side crowd underwater walk scuba good experience though

Content: Quiet, few people, good option of F&B offers.A bit disappointing the clearness of water (dotted with plastic garbage).
review: quiet people good option fb offersa bit disappointing clearness water dot plastic garbage

Content: nusa dua beach is one of the best beaches of Bali it is must visit place if you are in Bali, amazing breathtaking beauty will surprise you for sure
review: nusa dua one best beach bali must visit place bali amaze breathtaking beauty will surprise sure

Content: We stayed in Westin so the beach is just nearby. There are plenty of people offering ski jet and other water sports. Work hard to negotiate for a much much better deal. We tried the banana boat and the children love it.
review: stay westin nearby plenty people offer ski jet water sport work hard negotiate much much good deal try banana boat child love

Content: We payed an entrance fee to use a resort. Be prepared to pay this fee if you would like a sun lounger and have a place to cool down out of the sun!The entrance fee is worth the money, you get access to the loungers with towels and a drink (may vary depending on resort), you also get to use their shower, toilet and swimming pool! All in all Nusa Dua is a very nice beach, bits of plastic here and there which was a shame - but it wasn't terribly polluted. For food you could eat at the resorts available, or you could walk out to one of the nearby malls where they have some restaurants dotted about. The access to the resorts and close-by mall really helps with planning and spending a day out at this beach
review: pay entrance fee use resort prepare pay fee sun lounger place cool sunthe entrance fee worth money access lounger towel drink may vary depend resort use shower toilet swim pool nusa dua nice bit plastic shame wasnt terribly pollute food eat resort available walk one nearby malls restaurant dotted access resort closeby mall really help plan spending day

Content: Amazing beach. Clean and serene. Perfect sand and waters. Loved every part of it. The brown sand had it all
review: amaze clean serene perfect sand water love every part brown sand

Content: The white sand and idillic sea view on the Nusa Penida island in front are pretty much ruined by the uncountable plastic debris floating in the water and washed ashore.Despite some efforts by the staff from the different hotela to collect the junk by hand, the volume is too much to remain unnoticed wheb swimming or walking on the beach.Depending on wind and weather the problem is more or less bad. In the mornings it tends to be the least as the sea is calmer.The issue is not specific to Nusa Dua, as we encountered simmilar situations on every beach in Bali.
review: white sand idillic sea view nusa penida island front pretty much ruin uncountable plastic debris float water wash ashoredespite effort staff different hotela collect junk hand volume much remain unnoticed wheb swim walk beachdepending wind weather problem less bad morning tend least sea calmerthe issue specific nusa dua encounter simmilar situation every bali

Content: We were at the Ayodya Resort (entrance fee). The beach was clean, staff very nice to us and loved the beach restaurant / pool. Perfect toilets, showers... Pay 500k (3 sunbeds / towels) = 400k spend in the restaurant, so you pay just 100k for towels...Younger kids = morning = big waves. Better to come around 3pm and later.
review: ayodya resort entrance fee clean staff nice u love restaurant pool perfect toilets shower pay 500k 3 sunbeds towel 400k spend restaurant pay 100k towelsyounger kid morning big wave well come around 3pm later

Content: This enormous stretch of beach leads off many beautiful hotels situated in Nysa Dua. There are “buoys” in the sea which demarcate how far one can swim. Sea is lovely and warm and when we were there, very calm. However at “low tide” the sea receded and sand banks were clearly visible! We asked a tour guide who explained that this often happens when there is “ no moon” as opposed to FULL MOON!
review: enormous stretch lead many beautiful hotel situate nysa dua buoy sea demarcate far one swim sea lovely warm calm low tide sea recede sand bank clearly visible ask tour guide explain often happen moon oppose full moon

Content: Lovely safe clean beach with warm clean water. You can walk out quite safely for a good bit before it goes deep.

Content: Quick economical trip across from Sanur. Beautiful clean beach, plenty of facilities. Can ride around the island, take a buggy and visit the Mangroves.Thoroughly enjoyed my day.Courteous and helpful locals.

Content: Nusa Dua beach is a pleasant wide and white sand beach, nice for walking along the waves, the ocean swell is dampened bij the reefs a few meters off the coast, at high tide the waves can exert a strong pulling force, however it is never dangerous to swim in the warm and clean sea, at times red warning flags are pinned to warn parents with small children and elderly swimmers for relative strong waves and current

Content: Lovely clean beach, offers tradesmen, swimming , braiding, water sports . When the tide goes out the seabed is full of little surprises to explore and is wonderfully clean.
review: lovely clean offer tradesman swim braiding water sport tide go seabed full little surprise explore wonderfully clean

Content: We had heard a lot about dirty beaches in Bali so expectations were low. We were pleasantly surprised - Nusa Dua has a lot of resorts so they keep the beaches quite clean. Lots of water sports options and also good to swim.

Content: Hi,It is a place to visit if you are around, I found it a good place to stay with family and close to the resorts and hotels. Many surfers there but they do not interfere with the swimmers. Some basic restorants can be found over there for a decent lunch.The beach is good but unfortunately we saw some trash in the beach (plastic bags, etc). Even though some people is cleaning the beach in the afternoon it seems that it is not enough to keep it clean. A lot of more work should be done to improve the cleanliness of this place.

Content: This is a really great beach. The water is clear, the waves aren’t too big, and the water stays quite shallow for a good distance.  Will definitely return.

Content: My husband and I hired Putu Bali Driver Tour.  Our first stop from our hotel in Kuta was Nusa Dua.  It is where high class resorts line the white sand beaches.  The vast grounds are beautifully manicured, and the beach is very clean in contrast to Kuta.  We stopped by to see the water blow hole at the end of beautiful park.  The water was calm so the water blow hole was not spectacular.

Content: The area is always clean and has lots of beach to choose from. There are lots of hotels that back onto the beaches that have excellent restaurants and bars. You can walk four a few hours along this coastline and see it change with every turn. Recommended for adults who love to explore the many food options and who love to walk. There are also lots of beaches to hire a chair and chill out for the day.
review: area always clean lot choose lot hotel back onto beach excellent restaurant bar walk four hour along coastline see change every turn recommend adult love explore many food option love walk lot beach hire chair chill day

Content: Great waters, strong waters which we absolutely loved! Much cleaner than Kuta or Seminyak. We also took the opportunity to ride a jetski which the kids thoroughly enjoyed.

Content: This is a traditional white sandy beach.Due to its lovely sand it has attracted lots of hotels along the shoreline and they all seem to share it the benefits for their guests.Lovely to wonder along on this warm evening. Content: Weird title? Maybe! Haha- but what I am trying to say is that Nusa Dua is more for older people or young couples- not a lot of kids running around. The beaches are quite and clean and the water is defintely clearer than in Kuta/Seminyak. You can do great water sport activities in Nusa Dua too. Great for activities + relaxation and less beach vendors than in the south.
review: weird title maybe haha try say nusa dua old people young couple lot kid run around beach quite clean water defintely clear kutaseminyak great water sport activity nusa dua great activity relaxation less vendor south

Content: Such a beautiful beach. Lovely to stroll along . Loved all the resorts right on the beach and also the pathway that goes along. We had a young bub and it ment we could take our stroller. Lots of great restaurants along the beach. Perfect for a relaxing holiday or day trip
review: beautiful lovely stroll along love resort right pathway go along young bub ment take stroller lot great restaurant along perfect relax holiday day trip

Content: Water is still pretty clear here at Nusa Dua Beach. It’s safe for kids (especially when its low tide)
review: water still pretty clear nusa dua safe kid especially low tide

Content: Nusa Dua is the trademark of Bali. Must visit spot when you are Bali. Activites on beach will keep you busy,
review: nusa dua trademark bali must visit spot bali activites will keep busy

Content: We went to Nusa Dua Beach as part of a shore excursion with Bali Charm.  My friend had wanted to snorkel and this beach was not suitable for this at all.  I think if you are going to snorkel in Bali you would need to rent a boat for this.  It was a nice beach with white sand, and easy to get into and out of the water.  However you needed to wear beach shoes as there are rocks in the water itself as well as some weeds. We also saw some garbage in the water which surprised us as we have not seen that at the other beaches we have been in the world.We ordered drinks so that we could use the table and chairs at one of the vendors casual restaurants. We did enjoy the swim and the quiet location after a day of looking at the sights and sitting in the car.

Content: Do yourself a favour & visit the beautiful sands of a Nusa Dua Beach via a stay at one of the magnificent hotels along the coast.

Content: The beach is clean, water depth is shallow, wave not so strong, very nice for swimming. The sand more brighter compared to Seminyak beach.

Content: Good and calm beach sandy it's beside local beach but still have privacy  you can rebt a bike there with good price .

Content: This being my fourth visit to Indonesia, I have visited lots of beaches, Nusa Dua beach is definitely a favourite! I would recommend Nusa Dua Beach some where for families with young children to stay or couples wanting somewhere quiet to get away. The water is clear clean and calm most days. It is not as busy as most beaches. Although we had a beautiful lagoon like pool at our resort we chose to swim in the beach most days. Already planning a trip back with extended family!
review: fourth visit indonesia visit lot beach nusa dua definitely favourite recommend nusa dua family young child stay couple want somewhere quiet away water clear clean calm day busy beach although beautiful lagoon pool resort choose swim day already plan trip back extend family

Content: On a sunny day when the weather is good, the beach is just awesome. But, during the low tide, the beach moves further making it unappealing

Content: This is probably one of the better beaches in the south of Bali. Personally if you want to experience true Balinese culture and the amazing beaches they have on offer you are better off heading east or north of Bali. Outside the typical tourist areas and away from all the trash that follows

Content: The beach at Nusa Dua is absolutely amazing. Clear water and beautiful light brown sand. Well maintained and clean. Seeing the sunrise from this beach is fantastic.

Content: What a delightful place to stay. The staff are super friendly and very helpful. We were greeted with cold towels and tropical cocktails. The beach and pool areas are maintained very well and they are gorgeous. The breakfast buffet is the best we have had.

Content: It’s been around for 30 years but the development still affords holiday makers everything they need from grocery shopping to high end purchases. Restaurants abound and the beach is still pretty clean. No trailer trash here.....🤣

Content: When we were at the Grand Hyatt Bali last time in 2016, we were surprised by how much plastic trash was on the beach and in the ocean. There was hardly any (though still some) this time around. The beach is very beautiful and it's nice that it's private for each of the resorts.There are also lots of water activities that you can do. A lot of reviewers have noted that the cost is much higher at Nusa Dua compared to, say, Kuta. This is true--the costs are about double from that of Kuta but if you don't want to deal with traffic and you're already staying at a resort at Nusa Dua, it may not be worth the hassle to go all the way down to Kuta just to save a little bit of money since you still have to pay for a taxi. For example--a 1 hour surfing lesson plus 1 hour of board rental afterwards is approximately 200,000 rupiah (~$15 USD) at Kuta and 400,000 rupiah at Nusa Dua (~$30 USD). A taxi may cost close to $8 USD each way so you're pretty much at the same price. If you're at Nusa Dua, it makes sense just to do the activities there as well.

Content: What a stunning beach!, beautiful white soft sand, clear blue waters that are warm and inviting.  It's like a little lagoon with no waves and stays shallow for a long way out giving you the confidence that it's more than safe to relax in the waters.  Little fish can be seen darting about. If you're after banana boats and jet skis whizzing up and down all day long then this isn't the beach for you. Beach cleaners from the surrounding hotels are constantly raking up washed up seaweed and keeping this beach pristine. The only annoyance is the 'lookie, lookie' sales men and women regularly stopping to sell you their wares, but they are friendly and polite and do move on.  I have had worse experiences with this in the world!

Overall my experience was not so good as I am not into water sports. I realized later that with limited time in hand, could have explored something else. So if you are really into this, then only go. As there are much better beaches in Bali.

Content: I was really surprised by the water quality when I came there. It was absolutely crystal clear so that I could see my toes in the water while being submerged up to my chest in water. No waves at all (because of the coral reef belt surrounding the area in the distance), but there is at times a strong current (strong enough to make standing still on your feet difficult) flowing along the coast line from right to left so be careful. And yeah there are so many beautiful fishes in the water and sea creature, inhabitants of the coral reef! You just need to swim maybe some 20-30 metres away from the shore to find them (and the water will be still up to your neck only).But beware of sea snakes which I saw twice in the water. Although they're mild-tempered and reluctant to waste their venom on us, they attack if provoked. So the best option would be swimming with goggles or snorkeling with a mask and watching where you're placing your feet if you swim far enough from the shore.The beach has clean sand with no rubbish on it. And there weren't many people on it!
