Content: Nusa Dua beach is one of the most beautiful beach in Bali.. We visited here during the new years holiday and it was very good, beautiful sand, clean and safe for children. The wave is blocked few metres away from the edge, so the children are safe to play.Will visit back..!
review: nusa dua one beautiful bali visit new year holiday good beautiful sand clean safe child wave block metre away edge child safe playwill visit back

Content: We stayed at Nusa Dua and were not disappointed. It's very different to the island of Lembongan. One can walk for miles along the paved walkways in front of many classy resorts and hotels. One can take a dip every few minutes along the entire stretch of the ocean front. The waves are gentle and calm and one can bob about for hours in the azure sea.  There are numerous sarong and dress stalls and many beach activities for the energetic. The beach bars are very special as one can enjoy a meal or an icy Bintang at any one of the resorts along the Nusa Dua beach. The beaches are uncrowded and more family oriented. If you are looking for huge surfer waves this is not your spot. It is more commercial but one can find a shady spot under a tree on the beach and enjoy a gentle morning people watching or soaking up the sun!
review: stay nusa dua disappoint different island lembongan one walk mile along pave walkway front many classy resort hotels one take dip every minute along entire stretch ocean front wave gentle calm one bob hour azure sea numerous sarong dress stall many activity energetic bar special one enjoy meal icy bintang one resort along nusa dua beach uncrowded family orient look huge surfer wave spot commercial one find shady spot tree enjoy gentle morning people watch soak sun

Content: A very good and nice place and also a must visit place in Bali. Especially the creation of water falls in the lime stones of beach when the waves hit the lime stones. It was an amazing experience to watch the same.
review: good nice place must visit place bali especially creation water fall lime stone wave hit lime stone amaze experience watch

Content: A clean beach with small waves. Not the prettiest beach I’ve seen. Fairly empty . The sand is not as white and fine as in some other countries! Water sports available.
review: clean small wave prettiest ive see fairly empty sand white fine country water sport available

Content: The sand is not fine, but just small pebbles, so once you get a few feet into the water the pebbles get bigger and not as comfortable as fine sand, the water was warm but be careful as it was the most powerful ocean I’ve every been in.
review: sand fine small pebble foot water pebble big comfortable fine sand water warm careful powerful ocean ive every

Content: Great beach, clean and safe for swimming. Warm water and clear. Close to restaurants and service provided by hotels.
review: great clean safe swimming warm water clear close restaurant service provide hotel

Content: We really enjoyed the beach. I went to different spots on the beach for surfing, we did some snorkeling (only saw few fishes though) and swam a lot.Due to the wind direction, there was some rubbish in the water on some days. Also, the current was quite strong some days.
review: really enjoy go different spot surf snorkel saw fish though swam lotdue wind direction rubbish water day current quite strong day

Content: Nice beach with cafes and hotels along the path. Water sports available. Theres really nothing else to say
review: nice cafe hotel along path water sport available there really nothing say

Content: seaweed is everywhere.   I noticed in some of the bigger resorts - Ritz Carlton & The Mulia they had clean sands and water.   It was hard to navigate in the water to sandy bottoms with so much seaweed
review: seaweed everywhere notice big resort ritz carlton mulia clean sand water hard navigate water sandy bottom much seaweed

Content: Clean beach with fine white sand. The waves so quiet and the wind so calm make us relax and want to sleep under the tree. Access to beach embarrasing but Nusa Dua complex is modern and so many Hotel & Resort around there.

Content: The beach is nice, with soft sand and shallow waves. We felt safe taking the children into the water since the waves weren't big.  I think access along the beach is only for the various resorts that join onto the beach, although there were quite a few sellers along the beach.

Content: Come and visit Nusa Dua Resort complex, you won't regret...It's a manage area with lots of hotels, mall (Bali Collections) and restaurant with Nusa Dua beach in it, the beach so beautifull...Recommended to stay 1 or 2 night at this complex.
review: come visit nusa dua resort complex wont regretits manage area lot hotel mall bali collection restaurant nusa dua beautifullrecommended stay 1 2 night complex

Content: Nice white sand beach, there is a enery fee of around 2000 0r 3000 ( 20 cents ) depending where you enter, or sometimes just a car park fee when you leave 10000 we found it was nice waves, water was not to bed one day and the next it was very dirty, so depends on the weather
review: nice white sand enery fee around 2000 0r 3000 20 cent depend enter sometimes car park fee leave 10000 found nice wave water bed one day next dirty depend weather

Content: Clean and beutiful beach has one of the best sea views with a nearby park and watersport activities.

Content: Good and clean beach. Had a nice time with my family. Good food stalls nearby. Had a good outing. Recommended

Content: If you think that you have paid for an expensive hotel and that's gonna give a nice and relaxing holiday at the beach, the jet ski will prove otherwise.You're not allowed to swim any further than 15m at this shallow beach with no waves.

Content: We had body massage on the beach under the comfy breeze in a really worth price (USD25 per hour)!! Many tourists tried this after we did (as it might appear a bit embarrass to do massage in the open area).

Content: It is really sad how this beach like most of Bali is polluted and full of plastic. We where told “it comes from Java” or “it is from the rivers, cause it rained” . Well there is garbage everywhere when you drive in Bali jungle, rivers, sea, cities and roads. Do something about it it is your responsibility and you will loos tourist to other destinations in the long run.
review: really sad bali pollute full plastic tell come java river cause rain well garbage everywhere drive bali jungle river sea city road something responsibility will loos tourist destination long run

Content: Have been to Nusa Dua Beach numerous times over the years and there are exceptional areas as well as just basic areas.One of the better ones is the beach near the Conrad Hotel.Great waters, strong waters which the kids absolutely loved!We also took the opportunity to ride a jetski which the kids thoroughly enjoyed. The ‘beach access’ for the Grand Whiz hotel was mostly rocky.
review: nusa dua numerous time year exceptional area well basic areasone good one near conrad hotelgreat water strong water kid absolutely lovedwe take opportunity ride jetski kid thoroughly enjoy access grand whiz hotel mostly rocky

Content: I don't think you go to the Bali for the beaches as there are whiter and cleaner in the world.  But as far as Bali goes, this one is pretty good.  I actually wenrt swimming in it.  Much cleaner than Kuta or Seminyak. Quiet and calm.

Content: The hotels in Nusa Dua are all excellent with good beach front locations and good restaurants.If you want a more authentic Balinese experience I would recommend the Nusa Dua Beach Hotel as it is the original hotel with beautiful Balinese structures and facilities.The beach is always clean and the local sellers are all controlled. The nearby Bali Collection of shops and restaurants is a 15 minute walk away and provide a good shopping experience.
review: hotel nusa dua excellent good front location good restaurantsif want authentic balinese experience recommend nusa dua hotel original hotel beautiful balinese structure facilitiesthe always clean local seller control nearby bali collection shop restaurant 15 minute walk away provide good shopping experience

review: beautiful spot clean white sand bicyclejogging track beautiful view sunrise

As other reviewers have highlighted, the sea go out some way at low tide, but the beach is clean and ideal for paddling if you don't fancy the hike to the breakers!

I’d suggest it if you want more than a paddle you’ll need a boat to go out the channel and through the break. Snorkelling is a must. Always haggle!!!

Content: Literally the ONLY beach in Bali that isn’t covered in rubbish and is also cool to do a bit of snorkeling. Also the only beach that isn’t unpleasant to get to, most beaches I’ve visited here have messy paths to get down to a very small beach littered with trash and are a mission to find and not worth it. Nusa Dua is definitely worth visiting!
review: literally bali isnt cover rubbish cool bit snorkel isnt unpleasant beach ive visit messy path small litter trash mission find worth nusa dua definitely worth visit

Content: The water is very clean except for the seaweed...I watched them clean the sand and what they do is rake the seaweed and then dig holes on the beach to bury it in...I think this is why there seems to be more seaweed some days compared to others because depending on the tide washing it back in. The Balinese selling their wares on the beach dont bother you..once you say no they walk away unlike Kuta and other places in Bali..compared to Seminyak and Kuta the beach in Nusa Dua wins by far...it is also a beautiful walk after dinner along the foreshore past all the other hotels with elegant bars on the beach and restaurants.

Content: Everytime we went to Bali, we always looked for a beach without so much crowded and had a glimpse of white sand. So the decision was always Nusa Dua which also near to the town and airport. Content: Great Dine! Professional Service!I can't believe words can express how great the dish here. Everything is amazing. Beside of the beautiful-look food served, they taste really good. Content: Currently staying at the Melia Bali , right on the beautiful and Peaceful Nusa Dua beach. He just radios to the next bay if anyone needs anything.There are possibly 6 sellers who walk around awaiting yr wave , they leave you alone straight away if you say no thanks. Each hotel has security guards at their entrance and peace and quiet is their priority so a peaceful day is guaranteed.

Content: Such a great beach! Beautiful view of volcano, spectacular sunsets and great restaurant all around where you can chill out and still enjoy the views.

Content: We got here at about 10am and it was still quiet and peaceful. The beach was still cool and breezy. You can easily walk around and see both sides of the beaches. review: nusa dua undeniably one pretty bali calm see clear blue sky even find puppy play thing surprise litter outside hotel stay towards resort

Content: We love the beaches at Nusa dua. With various little lagoons and varying scenery they are far nicer in my opinion than seminyak.

Content: Well kept, lovely long and wide beach.. staff at Grand Bali Hyat keep their area very well maintained and clean, much appreciated

Content: If you like a quieter atmosphere then this is worth the time to visit. Away from the hussle of Kuta and Seminyak, Nusa Dua beach offers luxury hotels, bars and plenty of shade to relax in and just let the day roll by. We strolled from pirates bay to the north along the beach Promenade stopped at Tamarind for lunch and a drink, see seperate review. High end hotels and clean beaches with viewd to Lombok island. Best suited for families with children and anyone who wants a relaxing hassle free holiday.Prices will be higher here for most things so get a great hotel deal early for off season value. It's worth it.
review: quieter atmosphere worth time visit away hussle kuta seminyak nusa dua offer luxury hotel bar plenty shade relax let day roll stroll pirate bay north along promenade stop tamarind lunch drink see seperate review high end hotel clean beach viewd lombok island best suit family child anyone want relax hassle free holidayprices will high thing great hotel deal early season value worth

Content: I am inspired by the designers of each beach spot of the five star hotels.   To walk somewhere different.  To take risk.  What ever people eating near the beach, should wake up the next morning thinking about the symphony of fine dishes with humming of waves.  The experience shows what a great rambling could be.
review: inspired designer spot five star hotel walk somewhere different take risk people eat near wake next morning thinking symphony fine dish hum wave experience show great ramble

Content: Stayed at one of the hotels backing on to Nusa Dua beach.  It is a very long beach with safe swimming areas marked by buoys. The waves are small, so you can go to water and swim. When the tide is out you can walk a fair way out in safety.A quiet beach, that is ideal to relax and chill out on.
review: stayed one hotel back nusa dua long safe swim area mark buoys wave small go water swim tide walk fair way safetya quiet ideal relax chill

Content: From the hotel we were able to get on to the beach. It is clean and very pleasant. Only thing is that the low comes from midday onwards so if you miss it, you'll have to wait till the morning. Also, there are a lot of activity peddlers on the beach. They are good, but sometimes it does get annoying when you are trying to relax.
review: hotel able clean pleasant thing low come midday onwards miss youll wait till morning lot activity peddler good sometimes annoy try relax

Content: A lovely beach with clean, white sand and clear water to swim in. Very pleasant to take a stroll along and not too many hawkers to bother you. Very nice.
review: lovely clean white sand clear water swim pleasant take stroll along many hawker bother nice

Content: So one thing you need to know about Nusa Dua (I didnt know this when I visited) is that in the afternoon time, the water goes WAY in away from the beach line making it impossible to swim in. However, this changes around 4pm in the evening when the water comes back. The best beaches to visit are definitely Geger beach, however it is very crowded and pretty expensive of you dont stay in the Mulia resort. From my personal experience, unfortunately we only discovered this on the last day, is the beach where the Pirate's Bay resort is on. On this beach, not only is it very free and un-crowded, you get the best beach chairs! We had this circle purple beds and they were the most comfortable relaxing beds ever. Theyre not even that expensive. Dont waste you time going to a beach infront of a hotel unless you're staying in that beach front hotel. On the whole, Nusa Dua beaches are definitely the best Bali has to offer.
review: one thing need know nusa dua didnt know visit afternoon time water go way away line make impossible swim change around 4pm evening water come back best beach visit definitely geger crowd pretty expensive dont stay mulia resort personal experience unfortunately discover last day pirate bay resort free uncrowded best chair circle purple bed comfortable relax bed theyre even expensive dont waste time go infront hotel unless youre stay front hotel whole nusa dua beach definitely best bali offer

Content: The beach falls towards the south western end of the Bali. A stip of land with blue water beaches on two sides. For an ideal swim and a nap on the sands, suggest the right side beach when facing the statues. The left side beach is more an activity beach. Do NOT miss the water blow that lies behing the big statue. It would be one amazing experience
review: fall towards south western end bali stip land blue water beach two side ideal swim nap sand suggest right side face statue leave side activity miss water blow lie behing big statue one amazing experience

Content: The views at night are so beautiful.  Either sitting at the Arawana restaurant or the kul kul  bar just breath taking.
review: view night beautiful either sit arawana restaurant kul kul bar breath take

Content: Water very low at low tide so get there when at least half way or walk along beach to operate as. But good beach. Safe for bathing
review: water low low tide least half way walk along operate good safe bathing

Content: The hotel (Bali Nusa Dua)gave us free coupons to get free access to lounge chairs. We arrived around ten and we were only a few other tourists on the beach. Very few vendors
review: hotel bali nusa duagave u free coupon free access lounge chair arrive around ten tourist vendor

Content: We have been to Bali over 5times and normally stayed in Seminyak however we wanted to try a new area. Nusa Dua beach is very lovely. Relax beach with no hustle. Not many people try to sell you products. However there were no public toilets there so you have to pay to use a toilet in a shop and they will charge you.
review: bali 5times normally stay seminyak want try new area nusa dua lovely relax hustle many people try sell product public toilet pay use toilet shop will charge

Content: Very clean beach, much nicer than Legian ect. Water is calm, good for children, however sometimes there is a strong rip. The beach is lovely to take a nice walk. There aren’t any people interrupting you by selling/bartering with you, the odd offer for a massage which is lovely on the hotel lounges. Very relaxing. Short 30min drive from Legian.
review: clean much nicer legian ect water calm good child sometimes strong rip lovely take nice walk arent people interrupt sellingbartering odd offer massage lovely hotel lounge relax short 30min drive legian

Content: Nusa Dua beach is very long and not too much people on the beach. Waves are small, so you can go to water and swim, if you decided to surf, you will find a place too - waves are not too big, but still you can learn and try to catch it just a little bit away from a beach side. Recommend!
review: nusa dua long much people wave small go water swim decide surf will find place wave big still learn try catch little bit away side recommend

Content: Very lovely beach. The sand is very white and there are a lot of happy tourists. Not many locals trying to sell things which is a nice break from other parts of Bali.
review: lovely sand white lot happy tourist many local try sell thing nice break part bali

Content: Beautiful beach , clean water, hotels ‘ private beaches but offers water sports activities. Not crowded , beautiful shore.
review: beautiful clean water hotel private beach offer water sport activity crowd beautiful shore

Content: It's a clean beach with few people but lots of rock.No shacks and no beer.Not like the vast beaches we generally see due to rocks.Lots of surfers and one can have a beautiful view of sunrise.
review: clean people lot rockno shack beernot vast beach generally see due rockslots surfer one beautiful view sunrise

Content: Nice beach in Bali..  Can't ask more than that..  Water is very very clean and crystalline...  There are a lot of turist but is OK... Childrens enjoy all beautiful day
review: nice bali cant ask water clean crystalline lot turist ok childrens enjoy beautiful day

Content: We spend two weeks in Nusa Dua with a family of five. The area is totally made for tourists and therefore it feels really safe, clean and comfortable. Of course it is a lot more pricey than Bali in general but with small children it is worth every penny. You can also relax in peace in the resorts which is nice compared to other areas where the vendors are quite pushy.
review: spend two week nusa dua family five area totally make tourist feel really safe clean comfortable course lot pricey bali general small child worth every penny relax peace resort nice compare area vendor quite pushy

Content: I think nusa dua beach is beautiful and cleaner than the other.i recommend if you want relax and silent.but if you want activity i recommend kuta beach.
review: think nusa dua beautiful clean otheri recommend want relax silentbut want activity recommend kuta

Content: Went to the public area of this beach.Found a spot with lots of space with no one around but then we found out why. The water here was filled with garbage. Lots and lots of it and not just small pieces but big pieces of plastic. We moved to a different part where more people were and it was much cleaner but still some garbage in the water and sand. When I walked the beach I saw there were people cleaning in some spots but other laces were pretty filthy. Very unfortunate and I'm sure the bigger hotels try to keep their sections clean.The water was nice and calm for swimming but just too much garbage to recommend anyone visit.
review: go public area beachfound spot lot space one around find water fill garbage lot lot small piece big piece plastic move different part people much clean still garbage water sand walk saw people clean spots lace pretty filthy unfortunate im sure big hotel try keep section cleanthe water nice calm swim much garbage recommend anyone visit

Content: A lovely beach, clear and clean and a nice path to walk along, linking hotels. Only a few free standing restaurants but look out for Pirate's Bay a great restaurant where you sit in treehouses and get served lovely cheap food.
review: lovely clear clean nice path walk along link hotel free stand restaurant look pirate bay great restaurant sit treehouses serve lovely cheap food

Content: Absolutely a fantastic beach! Very clean! This place is really protected and taken care of by the government, main tourist attraction! The resorts here are all top notch and offer different feel and amenities, male sure and do your home work!The water is gorgeous, so clear!
review: absolutely fantastic clean place really protect take care government main tourist attraction resort top notch offer different feel amenity male sure home workthe water gorgeous clear

Content: Yellow sand (not black like other beaches). and clean, clear beautiful water to swim in . When the tide starts to go down the water is just gorgeous to sit in for hours.
review: yellow sand black beach clean clear beautiful water swim tide start go water gorgeous sit hour

Content: The Beachfront lines a number of high end resorts. Its clean and secure with no hawkers etc. You can walk all the way down it to Bali Collection..
review: beachfront line number high end resort clean secure hawker etc walk way bali collection

Content: Not really great for swimming. Lots of watersports catering to tour groups at the far end. OK for a walk but must walk through a hotel or business to get to the beach.

Content: This beach is part of the Melia Bali hotelgood sandy beach water is shallow at high tide at low tide the water is far outpaddle boarding,jet skiing and boat trips can be had along the beach
review: part melia bali hotelgood sandy water shallow high tide low tide water far outpaddle boardingjet ski boat trip along

Content: Was extremely shocked to find the waters edge filled with rubbish - as we walked along we noticed that the cleanness areas to swim are in front of the top hotels eg: club med who take pride in cleaning the beachfront of their hotel. Nusa Dua beach was lovely and quiet with no annoying sales people approaching you with goods like seminyak beach. The sand itself is coral, so sand shoes are a must. Lovely sheltered temples to relax under along the beach . There are also market stalls of clothes and the prices were cheaper than seminyak or ubud.
review: extremely shocked find water edge fill rubbish walk along noticed cleanness area swim front top hotel eg club med take pride clean beachfront hotel nusa dua lovely quiet annoy sale people approach good seminyak sand coral sand shoe must lovely sheltered temple relax along market stall clothes price cheap seminyak ubud

Content: Very dirty - honestly dont understand what the fuss is about, Bali has more beautiful beaches! Try swimming with yoghurt cups, lots of plastic and plastic bags... disguisting. Time for travellers to take more responsibility over the impact we make on the places that we are visiting...
review: dirty honestly dont understand fuss bali beautiful beach try swim yoghurt cup lots plastic plastic bag disguisting time traveller take responsibility impact make place visit

Content: The price of alcoholic drinks and cigarettes on the beach can be negotiated. The boat trip organizers and masseuses on the beach will try every few hours to get you to have a massage. Avoid saying yes if you don’t intend to, because they get offended.
review: price alcoholic drink cigarette negotiate boat trip organizer masseuse will try every hour massage avoid say yes dont intend offend

Content: Such a beautiful beach, in such a beautiful country.... Fell in love with Bali from minute one! Would (and will!) return the very first chance I have enough time to travel to the South Pacific. Indonesia, thank you! (Jaime Alcaraz Montreal)
review: beautiful beautiful country fell love bali minute one will return first chance enough time travel south pacific indonesia thank jaime alcaraz montreal

Content: Compared to other beach in Bali, Nusa Dua Beach is my favorite. It's clean and blue beach with white sandy beach. Not too crowded, perfect to chill and do sunbathing.

Content: Ideal for surfing - beginers, there are many surfing schols, nice sand beach, not nice beach after 14.00 because of low tide...

Content: As previously submitted, this resort is of a very high standard, and we have already decided that we will be returning in a couple of years

Content: Lovely beach, beware that this is mainly because at high tide the waves are broken away from the beach leaving still clear water close to the beach. At low tide this empties leaving little water and seaweed close to the beach. We loved the paddle boarding.

Content: Great alternative to the multiple pools available in the resort.The beach activities were fun, jet skis (woo hoo).  We all enjoyed immensely.  Plenty of places to relax with many chairs and day beds.  The beach bar was over used.
review: great alternative multiple pool available resortthe activity fun jet ski woo hoo enjoy immensely plenty place relax many chair day bed bar use

Content: You must come here if your in Bali Totally worth the taxi fare from KutaApprox $30-$40 return trip on s bluebird metered Taxi.We loved it so much and recommend everyone to come and see,

Content: Nice smooth sand but sadly there is always litter coming in from the ocean. You can go for nice long walks which was great.

Content: This beach is a local beach very quiet and beautiful. The locals are so sweet the food on the beach is cheap and tasty. The only down side is there was a lot of Europeans that showed up late in the day.

Content: The location is inside Nusa Dua. A great place to visit and advised to bring the family along. Beautiful beach to spend the afternoon, while waiting for the waves.

Content: Breathtakingly beautiful! Crystal clear with shades of blue, white sand, spectacular, flat water, you can lay there and float away. Best beach experience yet!

Content: This beach fronts home many Nusa dua hotels which make avaliable sun loungers to it's patrons, although this luxuary is not avaliable to the public beach which is the smaller of two bays that make up the Nusa Dua beaches. The sand of these beches is soft although a little harsher under foot neare the water. The sea deapth was relatively shallow even at high tide during our stay at a metre or less,although the public beach side has some deeper areas in it's bay, but both sides may be a little higher at different moon phases. Both beaches have reefs at there fronts edges which makes them shallow in the main, and thus no significant waves to catch you out.  With it's palm fringed front and soft sands it is has the idilic feel a long haul holiday/honeymoon has to make you feel good.

Content: Crystal clear waters and white sand! Very nice beach. Activities available all down the beach, clean water(no rubbish around) and a bunch of flash resorts to stop in for a drink
review: crystal clear water white sand nice activity available clean waterno rubbish around bunch flash resort stop drink

Content: Water on the beach was pristine, blue and clear, looked incredible. Visited other beaches around Bali whilst sight seeing and none of them topped the beach at Nusa Dua. Only down side being a few pieces of rubbish that had washed up or been thrown there, but still a lot less then any other beaches. Beautiful to swim in on a hot day when the pools aren't enough.
review: water pristine blue clear look incredible visited beach around bali whilst sight see none top nusa dua side piece rubbish wash thrown still lot less beach beautiful swim hot day pool arent enough

Content: Fabulos beach no shale or sroney beach sand sand sand .very shallow only up to waist high for a great way out only then does it get deeper.not alot of fish about so not great for snorkling gotta get a boat to take you out further for that.cafe is great have your food at the bar we found it got cold by the time it took to get to the beach at the cafe you got good food drinks ciggies some snacks .food was always fresh cooked from what i could see and had .never had bali beli .toilets basic :but unisex as the day goes on they do smell and dont get cleaned regulary.enough.Sunbeds get there early only 100 idr for two all day .prices go up as the beach fills .beach vendours once told no they didnt bother us again .massage highly recommend it yiann also known as numder 5 amazing lady 200idr for full body best money spent all holiday .Taxis get the local blue or blue bird dont get the others your likely to get ripped off the bar will even get you one.

Content: Beautiful white soft sand with clear warm water.  Safe for swimming.  Lovely gentle breeze all day.  We think this is the best beach in Bali and we have visited and stayed in many different areas of Bali
review: beautiful white soft sand clear warm water safe swimming lovely gentle breeze day think best bali visit stay many different area bali

Content: Just returned from Bali. Beaches and water are perfect.  Areas where beach is not groomed have lots of trash but not in front of the hotels

Content: The beach is not so great as the waters are very still and there are hardly any waves. There are many luxurious resorts around and people just cool their heels. Everything here is expensive and the best part we liked is water blow. There are lot of cultural events that take place. Food s great. We can see the far islands nusa lemboghan and penida from here. Bargain to half for the water sports.

Content: Oh and avoid the sea urchin. Not great for any swimming activity as there are too many reeds the whole way round the pennisula
review: oh avoid sea urchin great swim activity many reed whole way round pennisula

Content: Nusa Dua beach is very nice with white sand although with only very small waves. Most of this beach area is very relaxing, with less bogan tourists (that you will find at Kuta beach) and more Europeans. Also, unlike Kuta Beach there's less locals trying to sell you souvenirs and massages, which makes for a more relaxing and peaceful experience. The water here appears much cleaner than Kuta as well. The only down side is that this side of the island gets the sunrise instead of the beautiful sunset that you get on the other side. But, if your goal is just to relax without being bothered then this is the beach for you.
review: nusa dua nice white sand although small wave area relax less bogan tourist will find kuta european unlike kuta there less local try sell souvenir massage make relax peaceful experience water appear much clean kuta well side side island get sunrise instead beautiful sunset side goal relax without bother

Content: Nusa Dua beach area has many locations.  If you access from the Bali Collection area you can get onto the beach in front of the hotels but it's not great.  Best public access is in the Geger Beach area or walk through the St Regis and park up on the sand by their bar.  Most of the good beach areas are in front of hotels.  Don't be intimidated by the security guys just be cool and make your way where you want to go and use the hotel facilities for refreshment and loos !!
review: nusa dua area many location access bali collection area onto front hotel great best public access geger area walk st regis park sand bar good area front hotel dont intimidated security guy cool make way want go use hotel facility refreshment loo

Content: Lovely,clean beach with only small waves,perfect for relaxing without plenty of swimming to do. The only thing it misses is the sunset,which is on the other side of the island.
review: lovelyclean small wavesperfect relax without plenty swim thing miss sunsetwhich side island

Content: Nusa Dua beach is a beautiful beach with crystal clear water and white sand. Very good for families.  It is a very quiet and safe place and very relaxing.  I will recommend  to ho thete if you are in Nusa Dua.  There is lots of trees to relax under if you dont want to stay under the sun all day.Very nice view too.Marie

Content: It was a lovely evening we decided to visit the Nusa Dua beach. The beach front itself has been completely developed, with numerous shopping complexes, beach clubs, Bali Collection (mall) all at the same place. The water is clean and shallow. Not much current so it is safe for young kids.
review: lovely even decide visit nusa dua front completely develop numerous shopping complex club bali collection mall place water clean shallow much current safe young kid

Content: Beautiful beach spotlessly clean with a path running along it with was a lovely walk with we did not than once

Content: Beach is just beautiful & ideally located next to perfect hotel in the laguna luxury collection. Secure & safe with lovely golden sand.

Content: One of the cleanest beaches in Bali water wise but the broken bits of coral make it hard to swim. Need water shoes. Subject to high and low tide so swimming is subject to high tide. Very pretty beach.
review: one cleanest beach bali water wise break bits coral make hard swim need water shoe subject high low tide swim subject high tide pretty

Content: apart from kuta and legian here is more quit. you wont have street seller try to offer you food or massage which sometimes it kind of bothered.

Content: Nusa Dua is good soft sand large beach in Bali the water is warm and clear but is not calm there are strong currents that pull you across and if you you are not a strong swimmer then it would be a struggle.For so called paradise I expect more.Walking along the costal path toward the Regis and Mula hotels the water is calmer but then it's hindered by shingles and pebbles.It's not the best beach I have been to what really lets it down is the tide will go out in the early afternoon leaving the beach a lot less enjoyable.It's quiet even with the hotels there's not alot of people for the amount of space there is also safe.

Content: This has to be one of the most beautiful beaches in Bali. It's good to visit with family and for a romantic time away from the all the party beaches. It is home to some good hotel chains and luxury shopping. The water sports here are really good.

Content: The beach itself has lovely golden sand. The tide does go out a way and when it is in the water is quite shallow but a nice temperature (September anyway). Great to go in and cool off or for paddle-boarding, which seems quite popular.We never found it too crowded. Very safe for children due to depth and no strong currents (that I was aware of) possibly due to the reef.Worth a  visit
review: lovely golden sand tide go way water quite shallow nice temperature september anyway great go cool paddleboarding seem quite popularwe never find crowd safe child due depth strong current aware possibly due reefworth visit

Content: Just wow... Everyone visiting Bali should go to Nusa Dua seaside. Just try and see, you will be amazed!

Content: Nice beach but the tide makes the currents strong. Some places it's like being in a rapid river. The resorts have restaurants by the beach front. Public access several places, but the sun beds are reserved for resorts guests. Places to rent equipment for water activities.
review: nice tide make current strong place rapid river resort restaurant front public access several place sun bed reserve resort guest place rent equipment water activity

Content: We loved this resort hotel. Positioned along the Nusa Dua Beach area and close to other resorts. Beach area is spectacularly clean and without hawkers.

Content: Beautiful beaches - most day beds are controlled by the hotels along the strip.  A great walk along the beachfront - many couples having wedding photos - eg 5 at a time - all during the day.  Hawkers keep their distance and you can have massages on the beach - either organized by the hotels at a price, or much cheaper on the actual beach. Sand is white, ocean perfect and many delightful restaurants to have a bite to eat with squirrels in the trees overhead
review: beautiful beach day bed control hotel along strip great walk along beachfront many couple wed photo eg 5 time day hawker keep distance massage either organized hotel price much cheap actual sand white ocean perfect many delightful restaurant bite eat squirrel tree overhead

Content: Super beach!The Laguna hotelI liked the relaxing atmosphere, friendly staff and hospitality of Bali people.

Content: Lovely hotel and staff, had Scoopon voucher which was great stayed in pool access room, very far from everything,shops etc, but perfect if you want peace. Pools awesome and huge, spa in hotel expensive but well worth the price, staff there definitely know how to give a great massage. Very friendly and helpful team.

Content: Most parts of Nusa Duas long coast line are divided up into parcels, belonging to the multiple hotel resorts, making them their private beaches, however they all have one thing in common, while there are plenty of beautiful and relaxing lounge chairs available, if you want to actually go into the water for a swim, consider going to another beach.There were tons of sharp rocks and pebles making it a painful process to get into the water, and the water itself wasnt really clear / nice, as on other beaches, not to speak of the dream like ones of Thailand.

Content: Beautiful beach with plenty of shade. The beach is clean and quiet, there are beach sellers here but if you are not interested no hassle from them. The sea is also clean however there is only certain times that you can swim as the sea goes out a long way. But there are several pools of shallow water where you can submerge to cool off
review: beautiful plenty shade clean quiet seller interested hassle sea clean certain time swim sea go long way several pool shallow water submerge cool

Content: Nusa dua beach is a clam beach with not much of waves. This is good for relaxation and water sports or activities.If you want waves, then this beach is not the right place. My son also found a star fish at this beach.
review: nusa dua clam much wave good relaxation water sport activitiesif want wave right place son find star fish

Content: One of the best beaches in bali ! We stayed 2 weeks at the Nusa Dua Beach Hotel & Spa and it was amazing!No Sunset here but in the early mornings you can see a beautiful Sunrise !!!
