Content: Nusa Dua beach is a great beach for families. The water is very safe for little kids. If you're coming from another part of Bali make sure you check when it's high tide and plan on arriving 1.5 hours before so you can enjoy the water for the maximum amount of time. The tide goes out a long way. If you have time, hire a bike. There is a track which runs along the beach all the way to Benoa with some great views of the resorts. It is interesting to check out how the rich and famous are spending their Bali time.
review: nusa dua great family water safe little kid youre come another part bali make sure check high tide plan arrive 15 hour enjoy water maximum amount time tide go long way time hire bike track run along way benoa great view resort interest check rich famous spending bali time

Content: Small beach , where the sea water is warm but shallow . With low tide , it's like a bathtub , we can't swim . Great for small children .
review: small sea water warm shallow low tide bathtub cant swim great small child

Content: Very beautiful beach , so many visitors,  you really feel that you are enjoying vacation.  So many well-known hotels and resorts and restaurants . You can enjoy local shopping
review: beautiful many visitor really feel enjoy vacation many wellknown hotel resort restaurant enjoy local shopping

Content: Quiet beach with access controlled by neighbouring resorts. No hawkers and a very comfortable environment if visiting solo. Beaches weren't patrolled on the day visited which is why I rated 4 rather than 5.
review: quiet access control neighbouring resort hawker comfortable environment visit solo beach werent patrol day visit rat 4 rather 5

Content: The view at the south end of the Nusa Dua Beach is stunning and we enjoyed the same by taking tons of pictures. The water can get quite shallow and thus one may need to walk little bit towards the sea but it is definitely worth it. The colour of the water and sand are something I loved watching. Must visit when in South Bali
review: view south end nusa dua stun enjoy take ton picture water quite shallow thus one may need walk little bit towards sea definitely worth colour water sand something love watching must visit south bali

Content: The beach is pristeen and safe although too shallow to swim. At low tide you get to walk out to the reef that completely protects the bay. There are a few vendors in the beach but they are friendly and not overly pushy.
review: pristeen safe although shallow swim low tide walk reef completely protect bay vendor friendly overly pushy

Content: We stopped here for a few hours early in the morning and the place wowed me. Id been to a few other beaches around bali and they all seemed to underwhelm but this is what i thought when i though Bali beaches.Golden sand, calm clear waters and the surrounding views are gorgeous. picture opportunity after picture opportunity. Maybe because of the time we got there (around 8:30am) but the place was nice and chilled and still was by the time we left and had a much more laid back vibe to the other beaches i had been.Definitely worth a visit
review: stop hour early morning place wow id beach around bali seem underwhelm think though bali beachesgolden sand calm clear water surround view gorgeous picture opportunity picture opportunity maybe time get around 830am place nice chill still time leave much lay back vibe beach beendefinitely worth visit

Content: Great beach always clean and well kept as it mostly adjoins the name branded hotels etc. At low tide walk out and look at the exposed reef, at high tide you can get your fill of water sports like jet sking, paragliding etc etc. For the family a lot better than Kuta as you don't get waves breaking and the rips and sweeps that are dangerous and come with the breaking waves.
review: great always clean well keep mostly adjoin name brand hotel etc low tide walk look expose reef high tide fill water sport jet sking paragliding etc etc family lot well kuta dont wave break rip sweeps dangerous come break wave

Content: Water is turquoise and calm during low tide. The view is spectacular and beach is clean! Just gorgeous
review: water turquoise calm low tide view spectacular clean gorgeous

Content: Great for couples or families ! A piece of paradise, very affordable. We stayed closed to Ayodya hotel beach, and rented beach chairs and towels for 500k each. We did some snorkeling, and though it's not a recommended spot, I saw a huge snapper, tons of blue spine unicorn fishes and the usual tropical crowd ! For water sports, ask for putu "chinky monkey" kamput at the Ayodya beach bar. He will give you cheap price and awesome time !!
review: great couple family piece paradise affordable stayed close ayodya hotel rent chair towel 500k snorkel though recommended spot saw huge snapper ton blue spine unicorn fish usual tropical crowd water sport ask putu chinky monkey kamput ayodya bar will give cheap price awesome time

Content: Quite beach located off several brand name hotels. Plenty of space to soak in the sun, build sand castles or take a dip or swim.  Relatively calm waters.
review: quite locate several brand name hotel plenty space soak sun build sand castle take dip swim relatively calm water

Content: This beach is nice and clean although there are signs warning of sea urchins at low tide. Plenty of water sports here and a well maintained path that goes from the Bali Collective down past the resorts.
review: nice clean although sign warn sea urchin low tide plenty water sport well maintain path go bali collective past resort

Content: The beach is beautiful golden sand, it isnt fine sand though. We loved it. The only downside is that there is a reef just of shore, when the tide goes out you are left with very shallow water out to the reef. To get there and in to swimable water on the other side you need to wade through a forest of sea weed. We didnt see many fish, which was surprising. We did sea a Banded Sea Krait though, a highly poisonous snake which gives a lethal bite!All in all we really enjoyed it, but after seeing the beaches at Seminyak, Ulawatu and Pdang Pdang, we wont be coming back
review: beautiful golden sand isnt fine sand though loved downside reef shore tide go left shallow water reef swimable water side need wade forest sea weed didnt see many fish surprising sea band sea krait though highly poisonous snake give lethal biteall really enjoy see beach seminyak ulawatu pdang pdang wont come back

Content: It was a very nice beach, but not very special or diffrent. The water was clean And the sand was light beige. Good place to tan And swim, but deffinetly many tourists here so it is not like a secret hideaway. Would go again.
review: nice special diffrent water clean sand light beige good place tan swim deffinetly many tourist secret hideaway go

Content: If you're into long walks by the beach... this is your place.Beautiful, calm waters with soft sandy beaches. The water is warm and perfect for lazing in.Has a promenade where you can a walk for over 3 miles. The promenade runs through all the top beach resorts with free access so there are plenty spots to stop for a drink and admire the view.Different lagoon spots to watch the waves and enjoy the calming effects of the ocean.
review: youre long walk placebeautiful calm water soft sandy beach water warm perfect lazing inhas promenade walk 3 mile promenade run top resort free access plenty spot stop drink admire viewdifferent lagoon spot watch wave enjoy calm effect ocean

Content: Here is where I've chosen to take the sun. The beach was beautiful, the sand fine and white, there weren't many people specially around 10/11 am and that made it perfect. You can rent a parasol but it is also ok to take a towel or a cloth and extend it on the sand, it is safe and the sea is calm and not too deep, still you can swim and enjoy the sun.
review: ive chosen take sun beautiful sand fine white werent many people specially around 1011 make perfect rent parasol ok take towel cloth extend sand safe sea calm deep still swim enjoy sun

Content: On first look, the beach looks lovely. However you really need to experience more of the island and once you have done that you will realise that Nusa Dua beach is really not the beach to be at. We had smelly camels walking up and down the beach when we were here, giving tourists rides. The camels were defiant and definitely didn't want to be walking up and down and up and down the beach all day. It just felt like I could be anywhere in the world and to top it the sand was rubbish. Do not get me wrong - the hotels along this beach are bloody fantastic.But seriously, if you thought this beach was fantastic, you obviously didn't experience enough of the rest of Bali.
review: first look look lovely really need experience island do will realise nusa dua really smelly camel walk give tourist ride camel defiant definitely didnt want walk day felt anywhere world top sand rubbish wrong hotel along bloody fantasticbut seriously think fantastic obviously didnt experience enough rest bali

Content: Certainly spending time of this beach in high tide is fun but there is an equal experience when it is low tide as you can walk out really quite far to where the waves break.
review: certainly spending time high tide fun equal experience low tide walk really quite far wave break

Content: the sand is the best and the beach is most clean in Bali. Much more quiet than the beach in Seminyak.  Overall, a great relaxing beach with spectacular views
review: sand best clean bali much quiet seminyak overall great relax spectacular view

Content: The best holidayss ever...romántic, amazing people, cultural, relax, funny, drinks, foods, animations.....unforgetable holidayss
review: best holiday everromántic amazing people cultural relax funny drink food animationsunforgetable holiday

Content: If you're going to visit Bali, don't choose Nusa Dua as your place to stay. We made that mistake and it is my biggest regret from that holiday. Although we rented a scooter and we managed to escape every day, it was not a good choice. Nusa Dua has a lot of resorts, restaurants and shops, but they are in a specific environment, you can feel that everything in there is under supervision and in a very strict conditions. Plus, everything is much more expensive than the rest of Bali. You will not have a complete balinese experience if you chose to stay there.
review: youre go visit bali dont choose nusa dua place stay make mistake big regret holiday although rent scooter manage escape every day good choice nusa dua lot resort restaurant shop specific environment feel everything supervision strict condition plus everything much expensive rest bali will complete balinese experience choose stay

Content: Very loooong beach with 50 shades of blue. Though it is hard to swim due to waves in the afternoon and you should check the low tide time.
review: loooong 50 shade blue though hard swim due wave afternoon check low tide time

Content: Very very busy beach you can't swim there as too many busts coming and going. Horse riding on the beach not a beach for relaxing best to stay in beachside resorts
review: busy cant swim many bust come go horse rid relax best stay beachside resort

Content: Clean clear water, clean beach, gentle walk into the deeper water- no severe drop off, great open ocean view.
review: clean clear water clean gentle walk deeper water severe drop great open ocean view

Content: Tge beach behind the grand aston should be beautiful. Sadly it is full of rubbish inspite of the hard work by two hotel staff. Luckily the pool area was perfect so the beach can be avoided
review: tge behind grand aston beautiful sadly full rubbish inspite hard work two hotel staff luckily pool area perfect avoid

Content: It was a very pretty beach.  although very shallow.  It was great watching the local fishers using the schools of black tip reef sharks to locate the fish.
review: pretty although shallow great watch local fisher use school black tip reef shark locate fish

Content: Nothing out of the ordinary, but a good beach. Went there one afternoon and there was a low tide. Cozy beach and seems to be good for surfers.
review: nothing ordinary good go one afternoon low tide cozy seem good surfer

Content: Well Nusa Dua beach has it all. Sun lounges, some shady trees, lovely clean beach with only a couple of licensed sellers. The ocean is refreshing and clean. You can get food, drinks, beer and ice cream. The fresh coconuts are fabulous, a must try.You just have to be careful not to get sun burnt.
review: well nusa dua sun lounge shady tree lovely clean couple license seller ocean refresh clean food drink beer ice cream fresh coconut fabulous must tryyou careful sun burnt

Content: Beaches are totally different in Nusa Dua as compared with Kuta,Legian & Seminyak,which are the popular destinations in Bali.The beaches are fairly clean(a little rubbish on the sand and in water on some areas of the beach),the sand is white and the water is clear.
review: beach totally different nusa dua compare kutalegian seminyakwhich popular destination balithe beach fairly cleana little rubbish sand water area beachthe sand white water clear

Content: Our hotel was set on Nusa Dua beach and it is idyllic to look at. Unfortunately as water sports (jet skis, banana boats etc) are common place now the sea is polluted with petrol and oil and you can smell the fumes from the speed boat's when sunbathing. I didn't actually go into the water (no one did) presumably because of the petrol etc floating in the water. The sand is beautiful and it is a real shame that the water has been tarnished due to the popularity of motorised water sports 😞
review: hotel set nusa dua idyllic look unfortunately water sport jet ski banana boat etc common place now sea pollute petrol oil smell fume speed boat sunbathe didnt actually go water one presumably petrol etc floating water sand beautiful real shame water tarnish due popularity motorise water sport

Content: Tide is out from 4pm so you can walk right around the bay. Lovely. Lots of beds available but they go quickly in the mornings.
review: tide 4pm walk right around bay lovely lot bed available go quickly morning

Content: Nusa Dua beach is just heaven. Calm warm ocean, clear water and beaches that are clean and well maintained. There is a 🚲 path and rentals are available at the hotels in Nusa Dua (guests only). The beach is kid friendly and has limited motor sports at the beach which creates a serene atmosphere. No tide so not a surfing beach. Ideal for sunbathing and wading. A better beach compared to Phuket, Penang and Mauritius 🏖.
review: nusa dua heaven calm warm ocean clear water beach clean well maintain path rental available hotel nusa dua guest kid friendly limited motor sport create serene atmosphere tide surf ideal sunbathe wad well compare phuket penang mauritius

Content: This  white sand beach is truly beautiful. I dont usually like to stay in the beach for long but this beach is just very special.The water is clean, the sand is soft, the wind blows calmly. I spent two hours doing nothing and slowly my mind and soul feel the serenity of the sea.Simply a must go beach
review: white sand truly beautiful dont usually stay long specialthe water clean sand soft wind blow calmly spend two hour nothing slowly mind soul feel serenity seasimply must go

Content: It's the best because of the sheer touristy feeling of being enveloped around hundreds of 5star properties and good crowd. And thats also why it's the costliest!
review: best sheer touristy feeling envelop around hundred 5star property good crowd thats costliest

Content: Been exceptional place to regenerate .There are a lot to e.g. Swimming pool, beach lovely service and food
review: exceptional place regenerate lot eg swim pool lovely service food

Content: A relaxed setting with great walking paths and good services for beach growers Not heavily over developed which makes for a relaxing and restful visit Cannot fault location
review: relaxed set great walking path good service grower heavily develop make relax restful visit fault location

Content: White sand, crystal clear water and beautiful aqua sea! This beach is what you would expect on a tropical island getaway! The water was so warm and lovely to swim in. I didn't want to get out! You must go before the low tide as it's not the greatest when there is no water. An absolute must-see in Bali!
review: white sand crystal clear water beautiful aqua sea expect tropical island getaway water warm lovely swim didnt want must go low tide great water absolute mustsee bali

Content: Ocean allows to bathe there, waves are not so cruel like on other beaches of Bali. Sometimes water brings too much of garbage but local people are very fast to clean up the mess
review: ocean allow bathe wave cruel beach bali sometimes water brings much garbage local people fast clean mess

Content: This beach is pretty narrow and the sea is too rough to swim.  However, it does have visiting turtles in the evening and there are lots of pretty shell.
review: pretty narrow sea rough swim visit turtle even lot pretty shell

Content: good for a leisure and/or romantic stroll along the shore. calm sea good for swimming or just laying in the sun sand and water! best experience of beach side.
review: good leisure andor romantic stroll along shore calm sea good swimming lay sun sand water best experience side

Content: Having tried a few different beaches in Bali Nusa Dua is the best I have come across so far. Its really clean and if you are willing to walk all the way past the St Regis then it is very quiet and makes for some excellent photos.
review: try different beach bali nusa dua best come across far really clean willing walk way past st regis quiet make excellent photo

Content: A very beautiful and lively beach, with some good beach activities. We were lucky to see an ongoing festival, which made our visit even more special. Water was not very deep, so the kids had a lot of fun. Definitely, one of the best beaches Bali has to offer.
review: beautiful lively good activity lucky see ongoing festival make visit even special water deep kid lot fun definitely one best beach bali offer

Content: Its just superb the MELIA RESORT SPA  has its swimming pool virtually on its beach such a treat plus the Santeria restsurant borders on the beach as well was delightful for lunch and a great barbecue buffet in the evening with good band and after a disco if you like plus it offers happy hours at its bar
review: superb melia resort spa swim pool virtually treat plus santeria restsurant border well delightful lunch great barbecue buffet even good band disco plus offer happy hour bar

Content: I went to this beach for a one day trip from Seminyak, I used Uber to reach the beach (paid around 150,000 IDR), and came back to seminyak again with a bike driver (+62 0 819-3305-1669 for 300,000 IDR). Compared to Seminyak beach it is much cleaner with a brown clear sand, area is calm and having different luxurious hotels). 2 coffee bars/restaurants are available of which Fleet Bar caffè. Also you can enjoy massage in the beach for a very low price.
review: go one day trip seminyak use uber reach pay around 150000 idr come back seminyak bike driver 62 0 81933051669 300000 idr compare seminyak much clean brown clear sand area calm different luxurious hotel 2 coffee barsrestaurants available fleet bar caffè enjoy massage low price

Content: There are some stunning beaches in Nusa Dua, however many have a big issue with plastic waist being washed up. I thing the hotels should make more effort and so should all the local people, in terms of cleaning up and recycling.
review: stun beach nusa dua many big issue plastic waist wash thing hotel make effort local people term clean recycling

Content: a very well maintained and neat and clean beach...was there with my 1 year old son and i could leave him comfortably on the sand..awesome place to take some great and memorable photos...
review: well maintain neat clean beachwas 1 year old son leave comfortably sandawesome place take great memorable photo

Content: Very nice and relaxing beach, with white sand and extremely cheap ($5) massage on the beach. Few little bars catered around the beach with a nice refreshing drinks and nice meals.
review: nice relax white sand extremely cheap 5 massage little bar cater around nice refresh drink nice meal

Content: White clean sands, shacks nearby,lovely scenery. Worth spending an evening here.Its also one of the cleanest areas of Bali & has many good hotels in the vicinity
review: white clean sand shack nearbylovely scenery worth spending even hereits one clean area bali many good hotel vicinity

Content: In my opinion, the only merit of this beach is it's quietness. If you seek good view, relaxing and having a tan then this is the place to go. On the other hand, if you are a surfer or water sports lover then you will not find theses activities there. Personally, I liked it so so much specially when you compare it with beaches in Legian or Sanur. Legian beach is perfect for surfers while Sanur beach is good for water sports.
review: opinion merit quietness seek good view relax tan place go hand surfer water sport lover will find theses activity personally like much specially compare beach legian sanur legian perfect surfer sanur good water sport

Content: This was probably one of the most beautiful beaches I have seen and experienced! And the best part is that it is not too crowded, feels like you have the beach to yourself!
review: probably one beautiful beach see experienced best part crowd feel

Content: I love Nusa Dua. I visit Bali two times a year and Nusa Dua is our favorite destination. We have here our favorite hotels. Beach is perfect for family trip with small kids. This isnt place for surfing. Small waves, so its friendly to you baby. A lot of watter sports with pleasent staff.
review: love nusa dua visit bali two time year nusa dua favorite destination favorite hotel perfect family trip small kid isnt place surf small wave friendly baby lot watter sport pleasent staff

Content: The Nusa Dua beach is so beautiful. The water is clear and the whitish sand is really soft on your feet. The resorts surrounding this area have lovely bars and restaurants next to it also. But there is one thing you should really consider before going: the high and low tides! During our stay at the Westin we could not enjoy swimming every day because of the low tide. During this low tide it's fun to walk and talk to the local fisherman. I don't know if there is an app for it but please make sure before heading to it if there isn't a low tide. Otherwise you can't use your snorkel.
review: nusa dua beautiful water clear whitish sand really soft foot resort surround area lovely bar restaurant next one thing really consider go high low tide stay westin enjoy swim every day low tide low tide fun walk talk local fisherman dont know app please make sure head isnt low tide cant use snorkel

Content: Have been staying at a resort in Nusa Fua area and we have been swimming every day.Water was good, not very salty, cold at the beginning but then you get used to it.At the shore the beach had many algae.In the afternoon the water goes in and you can walk where the water was.
review: stay resort nusa fua area swim every daywater good salty cold beginning use itat shore many algaein afternoon water go walk water

Content: A local told us Nusa Dua is the most beautiful beach in Bali. It is definitely better than most beaches we have seen here but it is not a WOW one. All the resorts all located at Nusa Dua beach so it is quite crowded. The water is full of sea grass and other stuff... All in all it is a lovely long beach.
review: local tell u nusa dua beautiful bali definitely well beach see wow one resort locate nusa dua quite crowded water full sea grass stuff lovely long

Content: This beach serves several upscale resorts including Regis, Adoydya and under construction Hilton. The beach is very walkable with light colored sand and a fell shells here and there. The surf varies according to tides but is naturally regulated by reef shelf 1/4 mile off shore. Most beach activity occurs close to the resort property lines. A large variety of beach equipment rentals are available along with potpourri of kites, toys and beachside foods. Remember bring your own bottled water and strong sunscreen. The beach is roomy and safe.
review: serf several upscale resort include regis adoydya construction hilton walkable light color sand fell shell surf varies accord tide naturally regulate reef shelf 14 mile shore activity occur close resort property line large variety equipment rental available along potpourri kite toy beachside food remember bring bottled water strong sunscreen roomy safe

Content: Always visit the beach once a month only for relax, having lunch by the seq while watching children enjoy the beach and play sands. No to busy beach very warm and elegant
review: always visit month relax lunch seq watch child enjoy play sand busy warm elegant

Content: There is one section of the Nusa Dua Beach where all top hotels are located and this section is like their private beaches . There is another section of Nusa Dua where all the adventure sports take place . All in all a very clean and safe beach .
review: one section nusa dua top hotel locate section private beach another section nusa dua adventure sport take place clean safe

Content: This beach by far is much better than Seminyak beach.The area is surrounded by luxury hotels.  The sand is not as white as Cancun but somewhere between. The water is clear but during high tide, there is debris and some trash washing up.The hotel staff are diligent at cleaning but there is only so much they can do.
review: far much good seminyak beachthe area surround luxury hotel sand white cancun somewhere water clear high tide debris trash wash upthe hotel staff diligent cleaning much

Content: After hearing how wonderful Nusa Dua beach is, we decided to go and check it out for ourselves. We were disappointed. The sand is dirty with tiny pieces of glass and debris. The water is knee high and the beach has no personality. What a bore! Go to Echo Beach, Batu Bolong Beach (both in Canggu) or Padang Padang Beach (in Uluwatu) instead! :D
review: hear wonderful nusa dua decide go check disappointed sand dirty tiny piece glass debris water knee high personality bore go echo batu bolong canggu padang padang uluwatu instead d

Content: A great beach for some R&R. The grains of sand are weirdly somewhat spherical, which means you can sink in a fair bit. There's lots of tiny crabs that flit about as you walk along. When the tide is out, there's a huge expanse of shallows to explore. Just don't get caught out when it comes back in!
review: great rr grain sand weirdly somewhat spherical mean sink fair bit theres lot tiny crab flit walk along tide there huge expanse shallow explore dont caught come back

Content: This is a pristine beach far from the crowds.  Have stayed at the Westin here several times and never disappointed. Highly recommend.
review: pristine far crowd stayed westin several time never disappoint highly recommend

Content: Not much more to say. Many private beaches, which is nice if you belong to one of them which we did, but if we hadn't it might have not have been so nice.Very clean and nice for someone like me who get jittery every time something unknown touches me in the sea.
review: much say many private beach nice belong one hadnt might nicevery clean nice someone jittery every time something unknown touch sea

Content: One of the best beaches.It has a white sands ,good to walk barefoot and good for kids to play.Nice view at sunrise and sunset.In some parts there is allots of water sports
review: one best beachesit white sand good walk barefoot good kid playnice view sunrise sunsetin part allot water sport

Content: Nusa dua beach is very clean and no strong waves at the coast compare to other areas in Bali, but please bare in mind that generally all the things are more expensive in Nusa Dua area.
review: nusa dua clean strong wave coast compare area bali please bare mind generally thing expensive nusa dua area

Content: The beach is really nice indeed although there were lots of dead weeds in the water during our stay. apart from that the water is crystal clear, the sand is clean and the hotels around offer enough to eat and drink in order to stay happy while relaxing and sunbathing.
review: really nice indeed although lot dead weed water stay apart water crystal clear sand clean hotel around offer enough eat drink order stay happy relaxing sunbathing

Content: Just as you would expect from a post card, these beaches are golden and heavily maintained. Be sure to go to a space that you can be in as most places are reserved by the shore side hotels. There are places that allow you to use a sun bed and order off the menu for a fee.
review: expect post card beach golden heavily maintain sure go space place reserve shore side hotel place allow use sun bed order menu fee

Content: Great little Lagoon bay. Calm waters with Rocky areas further out. Food available supported by the hotels and the beach is clean.
review: great little lagoon bay calm water rocky area food available support hotel clean

Content: Great beach, heard that it is drily and not that flash but we experienced it as a well maintained beach with the resorts managing the tourist littering well and keeping it in great form.  Sunrise was particularly excellent.
review: great hear drily flash experience well maintain resort manage tourist litter well keep great form sunrise particularly excellent

Content: Beautiful beach in Bali. Clean beach, well maintained waterline, warm water, lots of fish. I would recommend !!! :-)
review: beautiful bali clean well maintain waterline warm water lot fish recommend

Content: A long, long beach, that changes character and cleanliness as you go. The beach in front of Nusa Dua Beach Hotel and its neighbours is maintained in pristine condition - early in the morning sweepers can be found at work, and throughout the day cleaners move through the area picking up rubbish. The sunrises are an ever-changing canvas, and when the heat sets in, the loungers are well-shaded under the trees.  At low tide, the sea grasses and sand pools are worth wading through, but tread carefully, as sea anemones lurk in the shadows!
review: long long change character cleanliness go front nusa dua hotel neighbour maintain pristine condition early morning sweeper find work throughout day cleaner move area pick rubbish sunrise everchanging canvas heat set lounger wellshaded tree low tide sea grass sand pool worth wad tread carefully sea anemone lurk shadow

Content: Great beach very clean and great to swim in. Can get anything in the beach to do such as jet sky etc.. you don't get bugged by the local sellers.
review: great clean great swim anything jet sky etc dont bug local seller

Content: The beach is amazing unfortunately is not much clear in some zone. Beach is long and you can rent a latvian beach with few euros! Place to go if you want relax
review: amaze unfortunately much clear zone long rent latvian euro place go want relax

Content: The sport activities are nice but the beach is not clean and the sport equipments are old. To enjoy the activities you need to bring your own equipments
review: sport activity nice clean sport equipment old enjoy activity need bring equipment

Content: white sands, clear blue water, the side of Grand Hyatt hotel is more private, less crowded. The other side full of beach bars and a lot of people. The beach can use more maintenance, a lot of trash everywhere
review: white sand clear blue water side grand hyatt hotel private less crowded side full bar lot people use maintenance lot trash everywhere

Content: Staying at the nusa dua beach and spa hotel the beach is beautiful can't fault it. Clean. Beautiful sand no rocks. Ocean is clear and warm. Just a perfect environment. Has plenty of trees if you get too hot and it really is hot on the beach even the wind is hot perfect for those wanting a deep tan!
review: stay nusa dua spa hotel beautiful cant fault clean beautiful sand rock ocean clear warm perfect environment plenty tree hot really hot even wind hot perfect want deep tan

Content: This beach was just outside our hotel (Grand Hyatt) - it is beautiful, clean and there are always sun beds free (based on a holiday that took place at the end of July/beginning of August) - if you are looking to take part in water sports however, due to there being a strong wind there was more often than not a red flag to show that the water was not safe to be surfing/playing about in too much as it got quite choppy at times!
review: outside hotel grand hyatt beautiful clean always sun bed free base holiday take place end julybeginning august look take part water sport due strong wind often red flag show water safe surfingplaying much get quite choppy time

Content: Awesome holiday at nusa dua. Loved the entire stay at westin. Beautiful place with awesome people who welcome all with open arms.
review: awesome holiday nusa dua love entire stay westin beautiful place awesome people welcome open arm

Content: What can one say about the beach here that hasn'tt already been said, the water here is pristine most of the time, extremely clean and just a great place to catch some sun or go for a dip, easy access and if your staying at one of the resort that border the water it's quiet and peaceful, sand is clean and the kids would love it.
review: one say hasntt already say water pristine time extremely clean great place catch sun go dip easy access stay one resort border water quiet peaceful sand clean kid love

Content: Beautiful sand and trash filled water.  There is a serious trash problem in the water in Bali. Bali has every kind of beach. Some are great for surfing, some for watersports, etc. This area has lots of watersports but the water is full of trash.
review: beautiful sand trash fill water serious trash problem water bali bali every kind great surfing watersports etc area lot watersports water full trash

Content: This beach is just amazing. White sand, clear water and beautiful landscape - what else do you expect?Located close to a lot of great hotels, the crowd and the facilities provided at this beach is great. Highly recommended!
review: amazing white sand clear water beautiful landscape expectlocated close lot great hotel crowd facility provide great highly recommend

Content: Full of rubbish but still nicer than Kuta. Was fun playing among the rock pools looking at little sea creatures. The scenery is nice if you focus to the distance and not the floating nappy by the waters edge. Surf seemed good
review: full rubbish still nice kuta fun play among rock pool look little sea creature scenery nice focus distance float nappy water edge surf seem good

Content: Very clean beach in the secluded Nusa Dua area - the hotels here try and keep the beaches as clean as possible - also not as crowded as Kuta or Seminyak
review: clean seclude nusa dua area hotel try keep beach clean possible crowd kuta seminyak

Content: Simply amazing with awesome scenery and restaurants with food selections that are scrumptious!! I enjoyed the beach with friends and solo!
review: simply amaze awesome scenery restaurant food selection scrumptious enjoyed friend solo

Content: If you like getting smacked around in the waves and letting the current carry you along, then this is the beach for you. We had a ball in the waves, we went in one part of the beach and let the current take us along and then jumped out and did it again.
review: get smack around wave let current carry along ball wave go one part let current take u along jump

Content: We were surprised at how clean the beach was and it was nice to go and sit on the beach and just relax.
review: surprised clean nice go sit relax

Content: We stay in a private beach  hotel,  so the beach was only for hotel guests! Clean and well treated:)They also offer yoga classes, cicling to their guests! I'm sure this is one of the best beach you find in Bali,  because in this beach stands the rich and famous hotels there! To visit Bali  beautiful beaches, you have to go book a boat and go an smaller island! There you with have better & cleaner beaches!
review: stay private hotel hotel guest clean well treatedthey offer yoga class cicling guest im sure one best find bali stand rich famous hotel visit bali beautiful beach go book boat go small island well cleaner beach

Content: Nice beach.  Sand is white and good. Not much space to swim, very shallow.  Waves look nice but far and no one go there (dangerous?).  Good beaches but far from Caraïbes beaches quality
review: nice sand white good much space swim shallow wave look nice far one go dangerous good beach far caraïbes beach quality

Content: Sofitel hotel has its own beach in NUSA DUA Very clean. Beaches and crystal clear water You can enjoy leisure walking during sunset and surise Enjoy relaxing body message in the cool air
review: sofitel hotel nusa dua clean beach crystal clear water enjoy leisure walk sunset surise enjoy relax body message cool air

Content: Perfect for family with kids. The current is mild and water is pleasant so kids happily go into the ocean. Sunrise is gorgeous. And the beach is lit up for the evening. Spectacular. Great for watersports for beginners: paddle board, windsurf, etc. Close to great snorkling and diving sites. Love it!
review: perfect family kid current mild water pleasant kid happily go ocean sunrise gorgeous lit evening spectacular great watersports beginner paddle board windsurf etc close great snorkling dive site love

Content: White sand, green and blue ocean with a great break. Plenty to see from the hotel frontages to the water sports and temples.
review: white sand green blue ocean great break plenty see hotel frontage water sport temple

Content: Nice sandy stretch of  beach that was very pleasant to be at. Less crowded and no one trying to see you stuff. We took a long walk from the Novotel private beach to lunch at Nusa Dua Beach Grill,  had a wonderful lunch experience.
review: nice sandy stretch pleasant le crowd one try see stuff take long walk novotel private lunch nusa dua grill wonderful lunch experience

Content: This is one of the nice beaches of Bali. It is very clean and well maintained but expect the flock of tourists. This is within the area of  the huge hotels so many people come and enjoy the view as well as take a dip.
review: one nice beach bali clean well maintain expect flock tourist within area huge hotel many people come enjoy view well take dip

Content: Lovely beach but as with almost all tropical beaches we have visited, there is loads of plastic in the sand... its the sad state of the world we live in now 😢
review: lovely almost tropical beach visit loads plastic sand sad state world live now

Content: Nice beach for sunbathing or walking. Not good for swimming comparing to Mediterranean Sea. But still better than Kuta. On high tide, you may swim with seaweeds.
review: nice sunbathe walk good swimming compare mediterranean sea still well kuta high tide may swim seaweed

Content: Nice beach, clearwater.Nusa Dua is a safe area, with shopping area, restaurants, lots Of activities.
review: nice clearwaternusa dua safe area shop area restaurant lots activity

Content: The Nusa Dua Beach resort area is well maintained with loads of top resorts to choose from.  The beach itself is nice enough, clean and looked after by the various resorts along its shore...the tides are extreme so you have to pick your beach times carefully.  There aren't too many locals harrassing you to buy their products which is good.
review: nusa dua resort area well maintain load top resort choose nice enough clean look various resort along shorethe tide extreme pick time carefully arent many local harrassing buy product good

Content: This is a clean sandy beach with calm waves. We had direct access by staying at the Nusa Dua Beach Hotel. Locals sell handmade stuff. Can spend a relaxing time under the palms.
review: clean sandy calm wave direct access stay nusa dua hotel local sell handmade stuff spend relaxing time palm

Content: Great for watching sunrise (Seminyak for sunsets!)Particularly good for water sports enthusiasts - plenty of choice for all ages.My preference is floating around in the warm shallow water in the secure areas away from the jetskis etc.Lovely area for parents with little kids!And no hassles from vendors on this beach.
review: great watch sunrise seminyak sunsetsparticularly good water sport enthusiast plenty choice agesmy preference float around warm shallow water secure area away jetskis etclovely area parent little kidsand hassle vendor

Content: beautiful.. serene.. amazing place for a long romantic walks.. take a dip in sea.. sit on the side with your favorite beer.. just awesome
review: beautiful serene amazing place long romantic walk take dip sea sit side favorite beer awesome

Content: Nice beach with clear sand. No activities at the beach however the beach is very good and clean. Can enjoy
review: nice clear sand activity good clean enjoy

Content: Good place for spend time with friends or family. Beautiful sea, very clean beach...  Right place to relax and enjoy . Good service as well.
review: good place spend time friend family beautiful sea clean right place relax enjoy good service well

Content: I think a good second to Jimbaran beach on Bali islandPleasant and nice and they say good for Surfers
review: think good second jimbaran bali islandpleasant nice say good surfer

Content: Beautiful beaches, can walk along the whole length of beach. All the five star hotels are along here and all of them have beautiful beach bars also on the beach. We've been visiting a different one each day. All good.
review: beautiful beach walk along whole length five star hotel along beautiful bar weve visit different one day good

Content: Spectacular beach and I am not a beach person usually. The water was warm and the beach constantly cleaned. Vendors are limited by the resorts so you are not constantly hassed
review: spectacular person usually water warm constantly clean vendor limit resort constantly hassed

Content: once you enter the water it is full of plastic and there are no life guards for the children. very unfriendly staff on the ground
review: enter water full plastic life guard child unfriendly staff ground

Content: Stayed in The Laguna Beach Luxury Collection a stunning beach front hotel, the beach is maintained daily with tranquil waters, the tide does come in and out and a marked difference between high tide and low tide, lovely beach.
review: stay laguna luxury collection stun front hotel maintain daily tranquil water tide come marked difference high tide low tide lovely

Content: This beach is your typical paradise when you think of Bali. Miles of pristine white sands and clear blue water with few rocks. The only thing that really bothered us were the sheer volume of chinese tourists taking photos on the beach. Not just a few nice photos but literally spending hours posing on the beach with sarongs blowing in the wind, etc. It got annoying because they told us to move several times so we weren't in the background. Best not to make eye contact either or you'll be stuck taking all the photos for them - this happened to us twice.
review: typical paradise think bali mile pristine white sand clear blue water rock thing really bother u sheer volume chinese tourist take photos nice photo literally spend hour pose sarong blow wind etc get annoy tell u move several time werent background best make eye contact either youll stuck take photo happen u twice

Content: Really clear water, much cleaner than Kuta but kind of boring if you're not doing water sports. Also most of the beach is reserved for hotel guests and a small section is public, where vendors start charging Rp. 250,000.00 for a deck chair and you can maybe bargain down to 100,000.00 so felt abit alienated. Better in the morning, low tide in July so the water started moving back slowly as the afternoon went on, pretty cool to see though! There were some food stalls there with seating space, nothing impressive, a 500ml water cost Rp.10,000.00 hotel prices so pack a nice picnic basket.
review: really clear water much clean kuta kind boring youre water sport reserve hotel guest small section public vendor start charge rp 25000000 deck chair maybe bargain 10000000 felt abit alienate well morning low tide july water start move back slowly afternoon go pretty cool see though food stall seat space nothing impressive 500ml water cost rp1000000 hotel price pack nice picnic basket

Content: A beautiful beach with beautiful views. Good pavement to walk on. Many places along the way for coffee or drinks
review: beautiful beautiful view good pavement walk many place along way coffee drink

Content: The stretch of beach is wonderful windy clear beach and water. Just nice for couple family. Best if stay in resort. They have people clean the beach all the time.
review: stretch wonderful windy clear water nice couple family best stay resort people clean time

Content: Many of the beaches in the Kuta area are less then pristine in paticularly in off season are not well maintained with litter on the beaches and debris such as plastic waste washed ashore Also uncommon in much of this area are green open spaces. Nusa Dua offers a large green park area adjoining the beach. The beach is well maintained and clean.It costs nothing to get in even though it is part of a larger resort.The landscape around the beach is striking-check out the cactus. The tidepools at sunset/low tide are worth exploring.
review: many beach kuta area less pristine paticularly season well maintain litter beach debris plastic waste wash ashore uncommon much area green open space nusa dua offer large green park area adjoin well maintain cleanit cost nothing even though part large resortthe landscape around strikingcheck cactus tidepools sunsetlow tide worth explore

Content: Nusa Dua beach is beautiful especially near St Regis hotel and Mulia resort . You can enter in between the hotels there is a road that leads you directly to the beach  . You must visit
review: nusa dua beautiful especially near st regis hotel mulia resort enter hotel road lead directly must visit

Content: The beach is very clean.  The sand is quite coarse and can get quite hot.  Plenty of shade.  There are lots of vendors walking around which gets a little annoying.  Waiters are walking around for drink service.
review: clean sand quite coarse quite hot plenty shade lot vendor walk around get little annoy waiter walk around drink service

Content: Very quiet and beautiful. Most beaches in bali are crowded but this beach was not so. Not recommended for swimming.
review: quiet beautiful beach bali crowd recommend swimming

Content: blue water, beautiful views, not many people - this place is much better compared with the busy, crowded and noisy Kuta beach.
review: blue water beautiful view many people place much good compare busy crowd noisy kuta

Content: We spent some of our time at the beach adjacent to our resort, and it was very nice. There were some plants floating in the water sometimes, and the jetskis and windsurfers were often very close to swimmers, which can be dangerous.The sand was clean. The massages on the beach are terrible - unprofessional and expensive. You're better off walking into town and having one at the spas there...
review: spent time adjacent resort nice plant float water sometimes jetskis windsurfers often close swimmer dangerousthe sand clean massage terrible unprofessional expensive youre well walk town one spa

Content: Surprisingly the beach now is more crowded with tourist wearing full cloth :/ And unfortunately all the beach spot there already owned by the hotels around :( Although its not as quiet as couple year before, but the beach still a nice spot and kids friendly.
review: surprisingly now crowd tourist wear full cloth unfortunately spot already own hotel around although quiet couple year still nice spot kid friendly

Content: It was nice to walk around there and to get  traditional light meal, very cheap. The beach was clean and the water very calm  but not good for swimming because the water was a little bit muddy. Not much we can do here.
review: nice walk around traditional light meal cheap clean water calm good swimming water little bit muddy much

Content: The view of the ocean is breathtaking!! I could lay on the beach and see the ocean for hours, ordering a fruit punch and enjoy the view.. Swimming into the ocean is not recommended if you are not a experienced swimmer. The sea is not the cleanest I have ever seen, but the sand without rocks is nice to walk on. Overall this is not the best sea for swimming, but the view is exceptional.
review: view ocean breathtaking lay see ocean hour order fruit punch enjoy view swim ocean recommend experienced swimmer sea cleanest see sand without rock nice walk overall best sea swim view exceptional

Content: This beach is sunny and quiet, very pleasant to walk or stay in the sun. It is not excellent to swim because there are rocks in the bottom of the sea, visible at low tide. However, there are some areas where we can bathe without any problem
review: sunny quiet pleasant walk stay sun excellent swim rock bottom sea visible low tide area bathe without problem

Content: Nice sandy beach but small. Low tide at times so not possible to go into the sea. Not suitable for very young children as the water isnt very calm
review: nice sandy small low tide time possible go sea suitable young child water isnt calm

Content: Beautiful and clean full of resorts. We weren't allowed to be under the trees. Bring your own shade or spend time in the public part and hire a beach chair.  Take a trip down to waterblow
review: beautiful clean full resort werent allow tree bring shade spend time public part hire chair take trip waterblow

Content: We stayed at Nusa Due Resort and this area is very nice and relaxed. As you move north the beach becomes very busy with motorised water sports (a bit like a motorway). Beach itself is good though. Sea is tidal so you need to plan your day to swim inside the nominated area.
review: stay nusa due resort area nice relax move north becomes busy motorised water sport bit motorway good though sea tidal need plan day swim inside nominated area

Content: We spent the afternoon here and thought it was stunning. The beach was far more picturesque than that of Kuta/Seminyak/Jimbaran. We walked out to the blow hole and then sunbathed on the stretch of beach between the two peninsulas. Definitely worth a visit!
review: spent afternoon think stun far picturesque kutaseminyakjimbaran walk blow hole sunbathe stretch two peninsula definitely worth visit

Content: Wouldn't spend much time on this beach, lots of litter and coastal erosion has taken away the pathway. Very run down and not pretty at all.
review: wouldnt spend much time lot litter coastal erosion take away pathway run pretty

Content: A must see and enjoyed many lovely walks here but was expecting the waters to look like pics.Water for swimming can be quite rough in some spots.Lovely to lay on lounge in sun and enjoy a quite setting in bali for a week prior going home.
review: must see enjoyed many lovely walk expect water look picswater swim quite rough spotslovely lay lounge sun enjoy quite set bali week prior go home

Content: One of the cleaner beaches in the tourist areas and close to the blow hole. Protected beach by reef/ rocks. Kids loved it
review: one cleaner beach tourist area close blow hole protect reef rock kid love

Content: Lovely white sandy beech but watch the waves and currents, they can take you unawares. One minute my husband paddling ankle deep in water the next he was in the water minus his sunglasses!There is a lifeguard but take care, particularly if you have children or you're not a strong swimmer.
review: lovely white sandy beech watch wave current take unawares one minute husband paddle ankle deep water next water minus sunglassesthere lifeguard take care particularly child youre strong swimmer

Content: The best beach from Bali. Top location, the sea is quiet on that side and you choose between water sport or relaxing on sunbeds. We recommend this part of Bali if you are looking tranquility and serenity.
review: best bali top location sea quiet side choose water sport relax sunbeds recommend part bali look tranquility serenity

Content: You should never ask Mexicans or Australians about beaches as they get an unpleasant sneer and say "we have better at home" and I'm sorry to say this was what happened with our predominantly Mexican/Australian group. Having said that, the water was warm and we had fun with paddleboards.
review: never ask mexican australians beach unpleasant sneer say good home im sorry say happen predominantly mexicanaustralian group say water warm fun paddleboards

Content: Had a great holiday in Bali, living or based in Nusa Dua and then exploring Bali from there. This area is quitter than the Kuta area. The hotel was 5 minutes from the beach.
review: great holiday bali living base nusa dua explore bali area quitter kuta area hotel 5 minute

Content: The beaches on Nusa Dua were what you dreamed beaches would be in Bali Beautiful sand, clean, and you could walk pretty far into the ocean. We snorkeled and had a great time.  They offer parasailing, paddle boarding, etc. or it was calm and beautiful to just lay on the beach with a good drink and a great  bookI would highly recommend a resort on Nusa Dua BeachWe stayed at the Westin Hotel Perfect location to enjoy the beach.
review: beach nusa dua dream beach bali beautiful sand clean walk pretty far ocean snorkel great time offer parasailing paddle board etc calm beautiful lay good drink great booki highly recommend resort nusa dua beachwe stay westin hotel perfect location enjoy

Content: Clean; great staff, drinks and food! Just perfect! I would return at any opportunity! There was great entertainment for couples, families, any one looking for a fabulous vacation location.
review: clean great staff drink food perfect return opportunity great entertainment couple family one look fabulous vacation location

Content: nice mixed experience of green gardens and beach... and this beach is peaceful although many tourists there ( we went on high season in July 2017)...
review: nice mixed experience green garden peaceful although many tourist go high season july 2017

Content: Nice clean beach close to Nusa Dua resorts. There can be a small wave but generally it is pretty flat close to shore.
review: nice clean close nusa dua resort small wave generally pretty flat close shore

Content: Water was very far out due to the low tide for most of the day which was frustrating, because the beach is beautiful when there's enough water to swim. Water sports offered along the beach are quite pricy and can be quite annoying. The beach itself has potential, but the low tide during the day took away the option of a nice swim in the sun which was disappointing.
review: water far due low tide day frustrate beautiful there enough water swim water sport offer along quite pricy quite annoy potential low tide day take away option nice swim sun disappointing

Content: A white sand beach. Water sports available too. Bali Collection with numerous eating places is just a walking distance away.
review: white sand water sport available bali collection numerous eating place walk distance away

Content: This is a great beach, but should be cleaned more regularly.  I loved lounging on it at the SR Hotel.
review: great clean regularly love lounging sr hotel

Content: Stayed in Nusa dua for a week and we loved it. We stayed at nusa dua beach hotel and resort and we had our own private beach. It clean and the water was clear. Not as busy as kuta or seminyak but we were there the first week of June so not yet peak season. I highly recommend this beach if you're looking for more clean & relaxing beach
review: stay nusa dua week love stayed nusa dua hotel resort private clean water clear busy kuta seminyak first week june yet peak season highly recommend youre look clean relaxing

Content: beach is groomed daily, first time I have seen sea snake babies on sand heading to the water (before sunrise very rare) , very safe beach swam with children in the water minimal risk of stingers / or sharks although a strong current and undertow, very safe and very interesting, .
review: groom daily first time see sea snake baby sand head water sunrise rare safe swam child water minimal risk stinger shark although strong current undertow safe interesting

Content: As travellers that have been to Seminyak, Canggu, Ubug, Gili's and Lombok before we were really disappointed by Nusa Dua (very artificial, overpriced, not authentic, no good restaurants!). We felt like we ended up in Disney Land. Everything is full of Chinese tourists, we even got asked by them if they can take pictures of us (we are Europeans). Place of mass tourism, crowded beaches, you'll get the Nusa Dua bonus on everything you buy (scooters, petrol, hotels, food). If all this doesn't matter to you and you want to ride a jetski, go parasailing or whatever do watersport in a place which does not represent Bali at all, then spend 100$ more and go to a hotel in the gated area!
review: traveller seminyak canggu ubug gilis lombok really disappointed nusa dua artificial overprice authentic good restaurant felt end disney land everything full chinese tourist even get asked take picture u europeans place mass tourism crowd beach youll nusa dua bonus everything buy scooter petrol hotel food doesnt matter want ride jetski go parasailing whatever watersport place represent bali spend 100 go hotel gate area

Content: Yes ppl dont freak out! Gili & lombok are amazing but are far from denpasar.Clean miles of sand! A lot of resorts to rent an umbrella if you consume a meal or drinks (300k on july2017)...To me the best beach! No trash and less crowded than kuta and seminyak.
review: yes ppl dont freak gili lombok amaze far denpasarclean mile sand lot resort rent umbrella consume meal drink 300k july2017to best trash less crowded kuta seminyak

Content: Nusa Dua is very upmarket boasting some amazing hotel/resorts, however, you could be anywhere in the world as it is quite clinical compared to the rest of Bali. Accomodation is pricey but still more affordable than the same sort of hotels would be in Australia. Food, beverages and entertainment are pretty much Aussie prices. I paid $15 AUD for an entree size plate of tomatoes, basil and mozzarella cheese in our hotel, which was expensive even by Aussie standards. A SUP will cost you $15 per hour, a bicycle $5 per hour. In Sanur, we paid $3 per day for a bicycle at The Puri Santrian which is also a 5 star hotel. I have to say I far prefer Sanur in terms of value for money and the beaches are just as nice.
review: nusa dua upmarket boast amazing hotelresorts anywhere world quite clinical compare rest bali accomodation pricey still affordable sort hotel australia food beverage entertainment pretty much aussie price pay 15 aud entree size plate tomato basil mozzarella cheese hotel expensive even aussie standard sup will cost 15 per hour bicycle 5 per hour sanur pay 3 per day bicycle puri santrian 5 star hotel say far prefer sanur term value money beach nice

Content: Stayed here around 2015 and thought it was really good. The facilities are good but not as good as the grand Hyatt. The fitness centre was really good, the pool was nice and all the resturants were really good. The breakfast was amazing and was much better than the grand Hyatt. The lobby was incredible and is one of the best I have seen. However when I stayed there wifi wasn't free in the rooms so I had to go to the pool or lobby to get internet access. I'm not sure if this has changed or not. The rooms were very nice and they weren't noisy at all compared to the grand Hyatt which is much older. Overall I think it's a nice place to stay, it's not as close to the connection centre compared to the grand Hyatt but it is a great hotel and I will possibly go back again.
review: stay around 2015 think really good facility good good grand hyatt fitness centre really good pool nice resturants really good breakfast amaze much good grand hyatt lobby incredible one best see stay wifi wasnt free room go pool lobby internet access im sure change room nice werent noisy compare grand hyatt much old overall think nice place stay close connection centre compare grand hyatt great hotel will possibly go back

Content: Great place to visit, would definitely recommend, however living on the Sunshine Coast our beaches are by far better & CLEANER.
review: great place visit definitely recommend living sunshine coast beach far well cleaner

Content: I'm glad to stay here after a very long and exhausting travel. Everything was quiet, peaceful and great to recover and lounge around the beautiful beaches
review: im glad stay long exhaust travel everything quiet peaceful great recover lounge around beautiful beach

Content: Sand not compact, many sharp stones, shells and rubbish washed ashore. Lots of seaweed, not recommended for children or anyone to swim out. Waves r big. View was good because the beach is private. Many wedding photographers coming in to take pics and shushed away by security. Wedding photo groups can add up to 4 or 5 every day! They smoke, litter and spit on the private beach. Hope ayodya security can effective chase them away and employ staff to clean beaches. Ironically the staff pick fallen leaves but not rubbish.
review: sand compact many sharp stone shell rubbish wash ashore lot seaweed recommended child anyone swim wave big view good private many wed photographer come take pic shush away security wed photo group add 4 5 every day smoke litter spit private hope ayodya security effective chase away employ staff clean beach ironically staff pick fall leave rubbish

Content: This year we decided not to have daily trips to temples as already done this last times and just enjoy the beach.We choose Nusa Dua and was perfect choice for my taste and needs:- beach was clean- you can see morning sunrise - water not to deep- water sports available- a lot of beachfront 5 stars hotels- a running path just along the beach for few kilometers - a close area with restaurants with live music and shopping opportunities - beach bars at each hotel- well maintained beach by each hotel with sun beds and shadow opportunities as after 11 AM the sun can be strong- every day a cool breeze from ocean all day long made the weather just perfectDefinitely if you look for sun, beach, sea and less crowd this is the place.I will definitely be back.Enjoy!
review: year decide daily trip temple already do last time enjoy beachwe choose nusa dua perfect choice taste need clean see morning sunrise water deep water sport available lot beachfront 5 star hotel run path along kilometer close area restaurant live music shopping opportunity bar hotel well maintain hotel sun bed shadow opportunity 11 sun strong every day cool breeze ocean day long make weather perfectdefinitely look sun sea less crowd placei will definitely backenjoy

Content: Beautiful white sand beach..most of the luxury resorts are near to this beach.Many restaurants,souvenir shops are nearby.Beach is ideal for surfing.
review: beautiful white sand beachmost luxury resort near beachmany restaurantssouvenir shop nearbybeach ideal surfing

Content: Stayed at The Grand Aston Nusa Dua Great Resort, the beaches along that strip are amazing and the beach activities so many things to do . but I think my favorite part was as soon as you step back into the resort Serenity.
review: stay grand aston nusa dua great resort beach along strip amazing activity many thing think favorite part soon step back resort serenity

Content: It's a nice beach, although you have to walk for about 5-10 mins to reach the nicer area of the beach (the sea is very shallow in one part, so you have to walk pass by it). After you pass the grand Hyatt hotel area you arrive to that part. The sunbeds costs50k per 1, the beach is quite clean, not perfectly clean though. The water is clean, only some seaweed is on the seashore, but it's not bothering you. The beach is quite without any sellers. The sea is sandy with no stones, which is also nice, coz you can play and walk safely.
review: nice although walk 510 min reach nice area sea shallow one part walk pas pas grand hyatt hotel area arrive part sunbeds costs50k per 1 quite clean perfectly clean though water clean seaweed seashore bother quite without seller sea sandy stone nice coz play walk safely

Content: We loved relaxing on the loungers at the beach. The calming noise of the sea and the clear water with nice sand. The beach is surrounded by some of the best hotels in Nusa Dua. The sellers don't really hassle you much and are friendly. The tide has an impact late afternoon which impacts the sea that is the only real disappointment.
review: love relax lounger calm noise sea clear water nice sand surround best hotel nusa dua seller dont really hassle much friendly tide impact late afternoon impact sea real disappointment

Content: Golden sands, shallow shelving and crystal clear water. This is a lovely beach. Delighted to have spent a week here.

Content: The sunset was good and very romantic, the sand was so warm and make me relax. I recommended this place for beach lover.

Content: The Nusa Dua Beach is a clean beach...Sea weeds at times may be an issue..But still a very serene sea and you a clean beach where sea can be enjoyed.

Content: Some very expensive , a lot have the same menu  The beach was a  disappointment with lots of rubbish in the water ... nothing like the pictures you see in brochures 😠

Content: We visited here while touring the Sheraton Hotel. Lovely beach. Beautiful water. Clean, warm, fresh.

Content: Beautiful beach with clear blue waters and white clean sand! Loved spending lazy evening here, watching the sunset and admiring nature at its best!

Content: Beach nusa dua is beautiful and clean. Safe for families with small children. Hardly any garbage, the sea water is blue clean and the waves are not too big.

Content: Not to many hassles from people selling stuff, great place to relax good food 🥘 around.Very clean.

Content: Beautiful beach, the best. So clean, white sand, like paradise. Have to go through security, bu we were lucky enough to by taxi, and they let us in. Not all the beach sellers to bother you either.

Content: Visited Nusa Dua for 3 nights... it was a great experience. If you are looking for a beach location in Bali.. this is a good option.Most good hotels have their private beach and resturants inside the property. You wouldn't feel the need to go out of your property.Ocean view rooms will be a good option. We chose grand mirage.. good option. There are other expensive options too.. depending on your pocket.Overall a good place with a good beach.

Content: One of the best beach in Bali and not consume to public so my family can play and relax around the beach.

Content: If there is the ultimate getaway in Indonesia where we can escape from everything else with a 5 start treatment, not to worry about quality of life, Nusa Dua is the place. This is the place Indonesia can be proud of and the resort area other countries envy.Miles of white sand beach, gentle even for beginners and children, plenty of water activities and tens of 5 star hotel resorts from the best names in the hospitality industry.A very secured place for all, the resort offer areas for those who are active from the break of dawn till after midnight as well as those who needs place to relax.
review: ultimate getaway indonesia escape everything 5 start treatment worry quality life nusa dua place place indonesia proud resort area country envymiles white sand gentle even beginner child plenty water activity tens 5 star hotel resort best name hospitality industrya secure place resort offer area active break dawn till midnight well need place relax

Content: Nusa Dua is dominated by 5 star resort with shady trees and beach chairs while the Jombaran Beach is reserved only for sunset seafood dining. Bali is so well endowed with kilometres and kilometres of sandy beaches that every part of the island can be carved out for different activities! With the hot sun during the day, hotels at Nusa Dua has done a great job in softening it up with investing in rows and rows of trees and shades, beach chairs, seaside activities... What a place to relax! There is a small portion open to the public. Beach chairs can be rented along the public section

Content: I think one of the best beaches of Bali . Water sports awesome .... very clean and silver sand . Just loved it .
review: think one best beach bali water sport awesome clean silver sand love

Content: Hi I have just returned from BALI  and our experience was amazing , culture , beaches , people at Bali are very close to Indian hearts we stayed at KUTA , NUSA DUA , And GILI TRAWANGAN And enjoyed the lot unlike to india beached are very clean and have all amenities only minus point is Bali beaches are filled with much stones  and many visitors specially children find it difficult to stay in local authority must put some information regarding the caution it will help tourist to pre plan to take beach footwear with them

Content: Depending where you are the sea is out a bit but clean beach. The stray dogs are friendly so we fed them they eat very slowly which I didn't expect. You don't get all the bothering there either but can get cheap massage

Content: I came to Nusa Dua and suddenly i saw a banner with words 'Nusa Dua Lights Festival'.  It was such an amazing experience. I really enjoy the fest. So many food stans and others. Its really fun!

Content: Great beach. Not too crowded .  A lot of good choices to eat and drink. Light show is not great but everyone goes to see it .  Best bike path in the island

Content: We visited Bali, Indinesia. We were staying at Mercure Nusa Dua hotel. The beach is very close and hotel arranges transport. We visited the evening and it was very pleasant. We spent more time to observe Indonesian marriage there.It was about to sunset, enjoyed a lot!

Content: Nusa Dua beaches are lined with beautiful 5 * Hotels, lovely gardens and restaurants. One can walk along the beachfront for kilometres enjoying the scenery and hotel facilities along the way.There are also little Balanize beach stalls along the way where one can purchase beachwear, sunglasses, hats and more.Plenty of water sports centres too, which is great entertainment if one sits observing all the activities.If you are lucky to be out first thing in the morning you may be lucky to view the magestic volcanic mountains before the clouds veil them for the day.A lovely part of BALI, with not too many people like the beaches in Kuta, Legian and Seminyak. Well worth a visit.
review: nusa dua beach line beautiful 5 hotel lovely garden restaurant one walk along beachfront kilometre enjoy scenery hotel facility along waythere little balanize stall along way one purchase beachwear sunglasses hat moreplenty water sport centre great entertainment one sit observe activitiesif lucky first thing morning may lucky view magestic volcanic mountain cloud veil daya lovely part bali many people beach kuta legian seminyak well worth visit

Content: We came out on a hot day. Our hotel had chairs and towels. The sand gave us a workout walking up and down, back and forth. The water felt nice, wasnt too windy outside. Seemed like alot of trash was left behind on the beach and in the water. Not to mention alot of rocks. We took nice pictures though...
review: come hot day hotel chair towel sand give u workout walk back forth water felt nice wasnt windy outside seem alot trash leave behind water mention alot rock take nice picture though

Content: Every day without fail my wife and I had a swim or a dip in the sea ( depending on the tide ) and afterwards a walk along the beach to dry off. It is cleared every day by the different hotels beach cleaners who keep it in tip top order. The only problem with this is that they also rake up the sea shells which we quite enjoy collecting. It is also a very interesting walk when the tide is out as you cane see lots of small fish in the shallows and if you are lucky a lot of starfish. Well worth the walk.
review: every day without fail wife swim dip sea depend tide afterwards walk along dry cleared every day different hotel cleaner keep tip top order problem rake sea shell quite enjoy collect interesting walk tide cane see lot small fish shallow lucky lot starfish well worth walk

Content: If you walk north, you will find a peninsula, which has a massive statue in the middle and has some grass fields. Very nice area.

Content: Fantastic beach, clean water, and hot weather if you like tanning. We were at the Novotel side of the beach. They provide some water sport activities too. Lots of tourist taning their skin there.
review: fantastic clean water hot weather tan novotel side provide water sport activity lot tourist taning skin

Content: It's a nice beach. We walked along the length of it but spent most time down the southern end (near the Mulia hotel) where our hotel had a small deck chair area to relax. This location was not overly manicured like up the other end with the huge resorts. I really liked that it had more of a local feel. A couple of dogs lying on the sand (but no problem - in fact added nicely to the local ambience), sunbathers, boat renters, local bar and cafe (rougher style). You can also walk further south along the path in front of the Mulia hotel to a restaurant.  Lovely gold sand, which is coarse but still nice. The beach does go down quite rapidly into the water (southern end) so just take care to watch your kids when they go paddling/swimming. Also the sand in the water is very loose so your feet go down into it quite a lot! Makes it harder to walk but also weirdly fun!

Content: Most of the large hotel chains are situated on Nusa Dua beach. Because of this it means majority of the sand area is filled with hotel reserved lounge chairs. If you are not staying at that hotel you may have to pay a price to use a beach chair. This also makes it difficult to exercise around (running etc).Very clean water and the best area to do water sports in all of Bali. Prices vary depending on day, time and your success with bartering.

Content: Nice beach for relaxing and the Nusa Dua area is great to take it easy, totally contrasted with the business to the north in Kuta and Ubud. However, the beach isn't anything spectacular: unfortunately there's often rubbish such as plastic in the water, not to a huge degree but enough. Pretty good waves and very safe for swimming as the breakers are far out. It's very shallow for a long distance. For the best beaches nearby you need to take the boat out to Lembongan, there the coral is alive and thriving and the water is perfect.

Content: Dnt miss if you love any form of water sports its simply great. there are various operators which offer different options. Drinking water and toilets are available near the beach. Beach is clean and great for hanging out.

Content: A nice strip of beach that runs along from the Ayodya past the Grand Hyatt Bali.Generally very clean compared to Tanjong Benoa etc.Many activities but do not go if you are looking for water sports.That,s what makes this area more relaxing and there are many hotel bars and food places along this strip.Try the Ayodya beach area for the lowest price beers and cocktails plus tasty food.You can even lounge there in the bean bags if you want to.

Content: The beach is some size and we were on differing portions of it at different times and on some occasions didn't time it right, so it gets a little getting used to. Too late in the afternoon then the tide was out and it really was no good. But when it was in the sand was beautiful ( a little too much rubbish and seaweed to be excellent ) and the waters soothing and warm. We spend a lot of time at the beach as opposed to the pool when away and Nusa Dua beach was good but not spectacular. I had expected better from Bali.

Content: Beach is ok, the sand is coarse and the area advised to stay within is very shallow, there is a lot of weeds and chorale at 4 feet depth and I would not venture into this area having seen the sea life in the rock pools when the tide was out.Was ok but not what we expected

Content: Most of the beach is accessible through the 5 Star hotels that line it. There is public access though at one end. the waters are shallow till very far out into the sea. Content: Well guarded area with securities everywhere. Perfect spot for picnics. There's bike rental if you wish to cycle around the area. There's also beach chairs along the beach for you to relax and graciously enjoy your coconut drinks (but it cost way way expensive compared to else where. 40 000RP for a coconut.)

Content: We spent 10 days in Nusa Dua. The beach is clean, clear blue water, waves calm enough for my 8 and 11 year old to swim and play around. The water is nice and warm and we often saw little fishes swimming nearby. We felt very safe any time of day or night. Another benefit is that you are able to watch Waterblow from here. Wouldn't stay in any other beach in Bali.

Content: Stayed at one of the Nusa Dua hotels which line the beach. Beach was clean and best of all for me I didn't see a single dog during any of the time I spent at the beach. Mostly tourists and towards one end of the beach was an area where a lot of locals bathed. There were a couple of vendors who approached but weren't at all insistent. Not the clearest water I've ever seen and some small stones etc. in parts but I was just grateful for a beach in Asia where I could totally relax and not worry about dogs.

Content: During our visit to Bali Indonesia to attend our Global event we stayed in Westin Resort hotel near Nusa Dua Beach. Content: My husband and I been to a few beaches in Bali and we think Nusa Dua is the best beach among the others. The sand is white, soft and most importantly clean. The water is clean and clear and fishes can be seen swimming through the patches of seagrasses just slightly off the beach. Nusa Dua is a public beach but most part of the beach are already taken up by the hotels. You can still find a few spots with shades but make sure you bring your own mat or scarf to lay on the beach. The beach seatings owned by the hotels can be used as long as you order some drink or food from them. We ordered a drink for IDR105k, which is pretty expensive, and used their beach chairs for a few hours.

Content: My fiancé and I got here in the afternoon on May 23, 2017 from Ayana Resort on the Western side of Bali. The tide was low and the water was set back about 300 yards from the shore. To really enjoy the ocean at Nusa Dua you have to be at the beach in the morning until around 1-2pm before the ocean recedes. The Pics never show that.
